The updated metrics are available in both the Copilot Dashboard and the M365 Copilot Impact report in Advanced Insights, with additional query support for Intelligent Recap meeting metrics.
GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Multi selectable DLP policies as an IRM triggering event
item.description:
Insider Risk Management is releasing the ability to select multiple Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policies as triggering events in a policy. Previously, admins could only select one DLP policy as a triggering event within Insider Risk Management policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams integration with Microsoft Defender for Office Tenant Allow block list for domains.
item.description:
Security admins can use the Tenant Allow/Block List feature in the Microsoft Defender portal to block domains for Microsoft Teams.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Edge: Ask Copilot from the address bar
item.description:
When users type a search query in the Edge address bar, they will have the option to send their search query directly to Copilot for a synthesized, more targeted answer pulling from across the web (and their work content, for premium users).
GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Customize the screen in Teams Town hall through "Manage what attendees see"
item.description:
Organizers will be able to effortlessly enhance their Teams Town hall presentations. In “Manage what attendees see” users will be able to customize their screen using select layouts, backgrounds, and name tags, resulting in a polished, high-quality, and engaging event. This feature is available with a Teams Premium License.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Confidence level filtering in Content Explorer Cmdlet
item.description:
With this feature, we will be providing confidence information in content explorer cmdlet export along with the capability to filter results on the basis of confidence level
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: New Voice Applications Settings for Authorized Users in GCC High and DoD (Premium)
item.description:
Voice applications policies allow you to create and assign voice application policies to authorized users. Voice application policies control what configuration changes an authorized user can make to the auto attendants and call queues they're authorized for. Authorized users, with permissions from Teams admins, can configure their call queues and auto attendants using Teams settings and opt in or out their team members to optimize for business needs. This is a Teams Premium feature.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent meeting recap available in multi-tenant set ups
item.description:
Copilot users in business-to-business multi-tenant organization set ups can now view the intelligent meeting recap after the meeting from the resource tenant where the meeting was hosted.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Onboard to the Places Directory with AI
item.description:
Seamlessly onboard to the Places Directory by using a new and improved AI-powered Initialize-Places PowerShell script. #MicrosoftPlaces
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: OneDrive support for Data Risk Assessments
item.description:
Within Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI, OneDrive will be added as a supported location in data risk assessments.
GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatically update your work location via your organization's Wi-Fi
item.description:
When users connect to their organization's Wi-Fi, Teams will automatically set their work location to reflect the building they are working in.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Agents in Copilot Chat available on Edge Sidebar
item.description:
Use agents in Copilot Chat on Edge Sidebar to simplify tasks.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Hunting on Teams Messages
item.description:
We are introducing three new Advaned Hunting tables designed to facilitate hunting of Teams messages containing URLs within your organization.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): SharePoint agent web part
item.description:
SharePoint site page authors can add SharePoint agents to their pages with an agent web part, allowing end users to easily access and interact with SharePoint agents directly from the site pages.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Room recommender
item.description:
If no room is booked for a meeting, this AI feature recommends rooms in the meeting chat an hour before start when two or more attendees are in the same building, making in-person collaboration easier. It considers location of participants, room availability, and capacity to find the best meeting space. You can reserve the suggested room with one click and update the invite for everyone. A Teams Premium license is required for the meeting organizer to enable this feature, which is available in Teams Mobile on iOS. #MicrosoftPlaces
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Share apps from app bar via right click
item.description:
Allow users to right-click and share apps directly from the app icon on hover, while using the app.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Pulse users can assign other users as delegates
item.description:
Viva Pulse users can now assign other users as delegates to create and send pulses on their behalf.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Shared Mailboxes as Accounts
item.description:
Shared Mailboxes can be added as Accounts in the new Outlook for Windows. The Shared Mailbox will appear at the Account Level in the Folder list. Access to the Shared Mailbox requires the user's credentials and associated permissions. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint and OneDrive Folders
item.description:
Users will be able to select SharePoint and ODSP Folders from the new "Attach cloud files" experience in CIQ to scope their prompts to.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Enhanced Device Inventory for Windows Devices for Government Cloud (GCCH)
item.description:
Gain more inventory information about your Windows devices. Choose which device properties you want to collect from which device and then view that information for your devices.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for all participants to start collaborative annotations
item.description:
All participants in meetings are now able to start collaborative annotations. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Transcript-based editing in Clipchamp
item.description:
We are introducing a novel and streamlined method to quickly and accurately remove any unwanted sections from your Clipchamp projects by leveraging the transcript. With transcript-based editing, browsing text, selecting unwanted words, and removing them will remove them from the video without the need to navigate the timeline. We are looking into making video editing more productive by providing a more intuitive and straightforward editing experience.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: macOS Platform SSO Support
item.description:
Enable logging in on a managed Mac using your Entra ID password.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: May CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - SharePoint Online extends library permissions to downloaded files.
item.description:
This new capability ties together SharePoint Online library permissions with Purview sensitivity labeling and protection. SharePoint Online document library owners can set a label on the library, automatically applying that label to all unprotected and unlabeled Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and PDF files at rest in the target library. This simplifies labeling in bulk across document libraries in an organization. This capability also helps protect files as they egress from the original document library, such as for collaboration purposes or attempted exfiltration. Files downloaded from these libraries are protected at download. Users accessing these files outside of SharePoint Online have their rights evaluated in real time against the online copy of the document. Changes to user permissions on the online copy of the document are reflected on downloaded copy, including full access removal. This provides a more streamlined way to revoke access to documents for individual users, versus revoking access on a per-document basis.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Ability to exclude spam and bulk emails
item.description:
Communication compliance policies will filter out bulk emails such as newsletters to help customers triage policy matches more efficiently. This will be an option for all policies in Communication Compliance. New policies will have this filtering on by default, but admins will have the option to configure as well as remove the filtering. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance helps organizations detect explicit code of conduct and regulatory compliance violations, such as harassing or threatening language, sharing of adult content, and inappropriate sharing of sensitive information. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are explicitly opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Risky AI usage
item.description:
With this update, Insider risk management will help admins identify risky AI usage. We are adding new detections of intentional and unintentional insider risk activity on generative AI apps that can pose a risk to an organization. Activities will include risky prompts containing sensitive info or risky intent and sensitive responses containing sensitive info or is generated from sensitive files or sites. Coverage will span across Microsoft Copilots and 3P generative AI apps. These detections will also contribute to Adaptive Protection insider risk levels. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal - Data Loss Prevention: DLP support for Fabric Lakehouse, KQL, SQL, and Mirrored databases
item.description:
DLP policy support for Fabric will allow admins to further scope DLP policies to lakehouses in addition to Power BI (which is supported today). Now in Fabric lakehouses, DLP policies can help audit and notify users through Policy Tips based upon sensitive content. In addition, DLP policy support will also extend to Fabric KQL databases, SQL databases and mirrored databases. Mirrored databases include Mirrored Azure Cosmos DB, Mirrored Azure DB for PostgreSQL, Mirrored Azure SQL Database, Mirrored Azure SQL Managed Instance, Mirrored database, Mirrored Snowflake, and Mirrored SQL Server Database.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Data Loss Prevention - Self-helper troubleshooting through Diagnostics page
item.description:
Admin should be able to troubleshoot device health and policy sync health through Diagnostics page.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Collection policies impact on IRM
item.description:
With this update, Microsoft Purview will start supporting collection policies. Collection policies allow customers to scope classification (SITs - Sensitive Information Types) and activities for scoped users. We recommend reviewing collection policies as they can be created by different Purview solution admins to ensure they are setup to detect the activities required by Insider Risk Management policies Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Dashboard - Broader access to M365 Copilot Chat insights
item.description:
Microsoft Viva is expanding access to M365 Copilot Chat Insights in Microsoft Copilot Dashboard by removing the requirement for 50 M365 Copilot licenses, allowing more tenants, including those with fewer licenses, to track adoption trends. Insights will include usage over time, group level adoption, retention, app-level breakdowns, retention, and more. Users can filter by organizational attributes to uncover usage patterns.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: People count captured by Cloud IntelliFrame in the Pro Management portal reports
item.description:
Admins get enhanced visibility into room usage from Pro Management portal reports with detailed occupancy data captured by Cloud IntelliFrame during meetings. This insight helps IT more effectively plan and optimize meeting spaces, and is currently available for Teams Rooms on Windows licensed with Teams Rooms Pro.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Discovery of sensitive data sharing to any cloud application or website (inc. GenAI) via network layer
item.description:
With this update, Insider Risk Management will support the discovery of sensitive files and text shared to any cloud application or website (inc. GenAI) via network layer. This capability is based on integration with 3rd party network partners (with data being captured via network layer). Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Generative AI apps activities as triggers in IRM
item.description:
With this update, the generative AI apps indicators will be supported as triggers in Risky AI usage policy. With triggers, customers can define the conditions for bringing the user into the scope of a policy while the generative AI apps indicators are used to determine risk score. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Move conversation feature toggle
item.description:
Engage admins and network admins can change access to the move conversation feature with this new toggle. This feature helps customers manage how messages move across communities. When disabled, only admins, corporate communicators, community admins, and community experts can move conversations. When enabled (default), any user with access to a conversation can move it.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updates to OneDrive file browsing experience in the Microsoft 365 Copilot app on iPad and iPhone
item.description:
Users on the Microsoft 365 Copilot app for iPad and iPhone devices will be directed to the standalone OneDrive app for file browsing and management. While users can still access their most recent files and search for OneDrive content within the Microsoft 365 Copilot app, advanced actions like folder navigation, permission settings, downloads, and deletions must be done in the OneDrive app.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Chat-centered experience for creating new documents in the Microsoft 365 Copilot app on iPhone and iPad
item.description:
In the Create experience in the Microsoft 365 Copilot app on iPhone and iPad, users will see a chat-centered experience to create documents, enabling them to describe the document they want to create in a prompt.  
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune settings available in Catalog and Account Protection template for Adminless feature
item.description:
Adminless settings able to be configured in settings catalog and account protection template.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Control External Access by Domain for Specific Users and Groups
item.description:
Gain granular control over external communication. By setting custom External Access policies, you can define domain allow/deny lists and assign them to specific users or groups - capabilities that were previously tenant-wide only ("Teams and Skype for Business users in external organizations"). Use this to pilot with a department, restrict high‑risk roles to approved partners, or open federation broadly where appropriate. Example: Allow Group A to communicate only with a specific domain, while Group B can communicate with all external domains.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Generative-AI skills for Create in Microsoft 365 Copilot app for Government Clouds
item.description:
Design and edit images, posters, banners, infographics, text drafts, and forms with Copilot—align them to your brand using kits built by you or your team.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 Copilot: Initiate Copilot Chat by sharing files to the Microsoft 365 Copilot app on iPhone and iPad
item.description:
When users on iPhone and iPad choose the action to share a Word, Excel, or PowerPoint file from a third party app (including Files) and choose Microsoft 365 Copilot as the target app, the file will be uploaded to chat. Users will then have the option to open a preview of the file or continue their conversation with Copilot Chat. 
GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Facilitator agent for scheduled and ad-hoc meetings in Teams Rooms on Windows
item.description:
Users can now use the Facilitator agent in Teams Rooms on Windows for real-time notes and action items during both scheduled hybrid and impromptu in-person meetings using AI. In hybrid meetings, the agent appears in the notes panel. For in-person meetings, a participant can scan the QR code on the display in the room to invoke the agent as the group's assistant.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat Notes
item.description:
A new collaborative space is now available directly from your Teams chat, enabling real-time collaboration, organization of key information, and streamlined communications. Chat notes is available in 1:1 and group chat, and is accessible only to the chat members. Add images, format text, share Loop components, and mention chat members when you require their attention.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft 365 Copilot search
item.description:
A new usage report will be available in the Microsoft 365 admin center for search in Microsoft 365 Copilot. The report will include total search queries, average search queries per user, search usage trends, and per-user usage insights.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Editor (Proofing and Spellcheck)
item.description:
Automatic spelling and grammar checking when composing an email message. Corrections are underlined on the draft, and clicking on them reveals suggested corrections.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: OneDrive: Transfer ownership of departing employees’ files with ease
item.description:
We’ve made it easier to manage files when employees leave—account cleanup emails are now more prominent, new filters help managers quickly locate key files, and the enhanced “Move and keep sharing” feature supports bulk transfers with consolidated notifications, making the process more efficient. Security and compliance in ownership transfer ensures sensitive data remains protected, access is properly reassigned, and regulatory obligations are met during employee offboarding.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: DLP Policy Tip Support in Outlook Mobile
item.description:
DLP policy tip support for Outlook Mobile enhances data loss prevention measures on mobile devices by providing real-time alerts to help users avoid accidentally sharing sensitive information, ensuring compliance with organizational policies.
GA date: January CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: DLP Policy Tip Support in Outlook Mobile
item.description:
DLP policy tip support for Outlook Mobile enhances data loss prevention measures on mobile devices by providing real-time alerts to help users avoid accidentally sharing sensitive information, ensuring compliance with organizational policies.
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Manage SharePoint agents via Agents page
item.description:
Admins can manage SharePoint agents as shared agents in the Agents page of the Microsoft 365 admin center. They will be able to block/unblock agents directly from Agent inventory.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Risky AI usage
item.description:
With this update, Insider Risk Management will help admins identify risky AI usage. We are adding new detections of intentional and unintentional insider risk activity on generative AI apps that can pose a risk to an organization. Activities will include risky prompts containing sensitive info or risky intent and sensitive responses containing sensitive info or is generated from sensitive files or sites. Coverage will span across Microsoft Copilots and 3P generative AI apps. These detections will also contribute to Adaptive Protection insider risk levels. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint Sites
item.description:
Users will be able to search for and select SharePoint Sites in CIQ to scope their prompts to.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Rich Bing web answer cards on M365 Copilot
item.description:
M365 Copilot will be showing the rich and interactive Bing web answer cards like Weather, Stocks etc. to relevant queries to enrich the responses.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Snooze, Pin and Ignore in the read pop-out ribbon in New Outlook and Outlook for Web
item.description:
Snooze, pin, and ignore actions are available in the read pop-out ribbon in Outlook for Web and Windows to improve triage efficiency and user control. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Chat] Search based user RSVP status
item.description:
Users will be able to search for meetings based on Self RSVP and Others RSVP status in Copilot Chat. Example prompts for a user looking for their own RSVP status include: "Meetings I have accepted/declined/marked tentative for today" "Did I accept Project OKR review meeting" "List all events I have not RSVPed". Example prompts for a user looking for other individuals' RSVP status include: "List RSVP status of attendees for the review meeting" "Who all have accepted the next meeting?" "Will Sarah attend Project review meet?"
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Generate a formula with Copilot from the grid upon "="
item.description:
Type “=” anywhere on your grid or in the formula bar and let Copilot generate formulas from natural language, making complex calculations simpler and faster.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Save an Event as a Draft on Android
item.description:
You can save a meeting as a draft on your calendar if you aren't ready to send the meeting invites. When composing an event with at least one attendee added, select dismiss and then select Save as a Draft. The draft event will show on your calendar as [Draft] along with the title of the event.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Folder Deletion Warning for Rules
item.description:
Outlook will show warning when you try to delete a folder that's used in a rule. This helps prevent accidental rule breakage and ensures your email flow remains uninterrupted. You'll be prompted to review or update affected rules before the folder is removed. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Show teammates' calendars in the left navigation pane
item.description:
Users can now see their teammates' calendars (including peers, direct reports, and managers) automatically displayed in the left navigation pane of the new outlook. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - DLP Policy Tip Support in Outlook for Mac
item.description:
DLP policy tips for Microsoft Outlook for Mac provide real-time notifications to users when their email contains sensitive information that violates organizational policies. Users can see policy tips directly in the mail tip UI and have the option to remove non-compliant recipients or override the policy if necessary. This feature ensures compliance by alerting users to potential data loss risks before sending emails.
GA date: January CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Enhanced Classification Support for Thai Language in Endpoint
item.description:
Thai Language sentences do not have spaces in between them. And for classification purpose, we relied on right keywords to be added while creating Sensitive Information Type for ensuring accurate match. However, with this feature, spaces will be added automatically in keywords which will ensure higher match accuracy in EndPoint.
GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Places: Microsoft Places Support to GCC cloud
item.description:
Microsoft Places features will now be available in GCC cloud
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Continue editing in Outlook from Copilot Chat
item.description:
When Copilot detects that you're trying to write an email—like saying “Draft an email to my team thanking them for their hard work on Project K”—you’ll see an “Edit in Outlook” button. The 'Edit in Outlook button will open a draft in Outlook, with the subject, message, and recipients filled in, so you can review and send it with ease.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Endpoint DLP support classification of Azure RMS protected Office documents
item.description:
Endpoint DLP can now classify Office files stored in Windows devices that have Azure RMS protection applied. Classification will be triggered when file is used in applications or when just-in-time classification is enabled
GA date: November CY2025
Preview date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Chat] Launch the full Microsoft 365 Copilot app when using Copilot Chat in the Microsoft 365 apps
item.description:
When using the Copilot Chat side pane in Microsoft 365 apps, users will be able to launch the full Microsoft 365 Copilot app from a dedicated button. Additionally, accessing some features in the side pane will launch the full app.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference a Loop or Page when creating a presentation with Copilot
item.description:
You can now reference a Loop or Page when you create a presentation with Copilot within the PowerPoint application.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference a Loop or Page when creating a presentation with Copilot
item.description:
You can now reference a Loop or Page when you create a presentation with Copilot within the PowerPoint application.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference a Loop or Page when creating a presentation with Copilot
item.description:
You can now reference a Loop or Page when you create a presentation with Copilot within the PowerPoint application.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: AI Workflows in Workflows app
item.description:
With AI Workflows in the Workflows app, you will have access to custom AI-powered templates to automate complex tasks and streamline daily operations. AI Workflows enhance productivity by simplifying task execution and helping users stay organized throughout the day. Admins can enable this feature to equip users with intelligent automation tools that make managing work more efficient and intuitive.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: New VDI solution for Teams optimization in Amazon WorkSpaces
item.description:
New VDI solution for Teams introduces multimedia offloading and optimization solution for Microsoft Teams when running in Amazon WorkSpaces (Personal and Pools). Users of the WorkSpaces Client for Windows can enjoy a high-definition experience in virtual desktops, where audio/video/screensharing are offloaded to the user's device and processed by the SlimCore media engine. This entry applies to WorkSpaces only (AppStream is not supported).
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Edit and manage Teams Town Hall instances in Outlook
item.description:
Organizers and co-organizers can now easily edit the details of Teams Town Hall instances. A direct link to the Teams Town Hall edit page is now accessible from Outlook calendar. This enhancement brings the same seamless editing and registration management experience already available in webinar, bringing a consistent experience across all event types.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Enterprise and Web Grounding for Draft with Copilot
item.description:
Draft with Copilot now has access to your enterprise data to help you craft high quality emails grounded in the right context. You will be able to review the sources used to generate your email draft before you send the mail.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Frontier and Microsoft agent user request approval flow in Microsoft 365 admin center
item.description:
For Admins, agents in the Frontier program can be managed through the Microsoft 365 Admin Center. They are listed under the agents & connectors tab in Copilot Control System, where you can view all agent inventory for your organization. Agents built by Microsoft and available in the Frontier program will be displayed in the Agent Store. This feature will support users to request these agents if blocked by organizational policies. Admins will have the opportunity to further approve and reject these user request.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Slash commands for apps
item.description:
You can now interact with your favorite apps directly from Teams chat and channels compose box using slash commands. Type / and start interacting with Apps and Agents, invoke workflows and more.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enable policy tips for recipients when emailed as part of a distribution group
item.description:
This feature enables policy tips for recipients when emailed as part of a group. DG expansion refers to the process of expanding Distribution Groups (DG) to ensure all recipients are evaluated for Data Loss Prevention (DLP) rules. This feature allows organizations to evaluate rules based on recipients contained in distribution groups, increasing the confidence that users will receive relevant warnings while drafting emails with sensitive content.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Dynamic watermarking for files protected with sensitivity labels
item.description:
Dynamic watermarking is a sensitivity label setting that overlays watermark text containing the consuming user’s information on content in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Apply a retention policy to Microsoft Planner content
item.description:
Introducing Data lifecycle management capabilities for Microsoft Planner. Compliance admins can now create a retention policy to manage content located in Microsoft Planner such as tasks for plans associated with an Microsoft 365 Group.
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: November CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Forward as attachment emails in a PST file in new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to forward as an attachment emails in a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Priority content support for Risky AI usage
item.description:
With this update, Risky AI usage policy template will support priority content. Customers can define Sensitive Info Types (SITs), Trainable Classifiers, Sensitivity Labels as priority content, and get alerted only when the activity matches the selected priority content. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Search with apps and agents personalized suggestionss
item.description:
We are enhancing Teams search personalized suggestions to include apps and agents. When searching in Teams you will now also get apps and agent suggestions which dynamically update as you type.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Increasing policy template limits for Insider Risk Management
item.description:
Insider Risk Management will increase policy creation limits from 20 policies per template to 100 maximum overall active policies. For example, an organization may have 50 data leak policy templates because the limit will now apply to all active policies versus each policy template. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Bulk replacement or removal of a retention label
item.description:
Admins can perform a bulk replacement or removal of a retention label using the Purview compliance portal. They can perform the action across the entire tenant or targeted to specific content using KQL and static or adaptive scopes.
GA date: March CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Bulk replacement or removal of a retention label
item.description:
Admins can perform a bulk replacement or removal of a retention label using the Purview compliance portal. They can perform the action across the entire tenant or targeted to specific content using KQL and static or adaptive scopes.
GA date: March CY2026
Preview date: January CY2026

item.title: SharePoint: Updated Document Library User Experience
item.description:
We're updating the SharePoint document library experience to more closely align with the user experience in OneDrive - while making it easier than ever before to access the valuable functionality unique to document libraries. When you’re working in a document library, we’ve brought custom views and filters front and center – just like in OneDrive. We’ve also redesigned the command bar to help you take action, faster. All your view customization tools are now grouped under one simplified menu, making it easy to apply conditional formatting or organize items by metadata in seconds.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: App Deployment in Teams Admin Center
item.description:
We're introducing a new admin setting that replaces the Installed apps section in app setup policies, enabling more streamlined per-app deployment control. With controls to pre-install the app for : all users, specific users and groups, or no users.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Automatic Draft Minimize
item.description:
When users close a draft in progress, it automatically minimizes instead of closing completely. The minimized draft can now be quickly accessed via a button that appears in the message list.RetryClaude can make mistakes. Please double-check responses.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Save an audio overview from Copilot Notebooks to OneDrive
item.description:
Save the audio overview that you have generated within a Copilot Notebook to OneDrive so you can download or share with others.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): 1-click to create a Brief page based on content in Copilot Notebook
item.description:
The 1-click page generation feature helps you complete tasks quickly. With a single click, Copilot creates a Brief page based on your notebook content—no prompt writing needed.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): 1-click to create a FAQ page based on content in Copilot Notebook
item.description:
The 1-click page generation feature helps you complete tasks quickly. With a single click, Copilot creates a FAQ page based on your notebook content—no prompt writing needed.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Content Sources in Copilot Chat
item.description:
Users will able to select content sources on Copilot Chat. When users select content sources the responses generated will be limited to content from the selected sources.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Catchup on important emails in Copilot Chat
item.description:
Copilot Chat helps you stay on top of your inbox by highlighting important and actionable emails such as messages from your manager, leadership, top collaborators, or emails containing tasks when you use prompts like “What’s hot in my inbox?” or “What were the important emails from last week?”
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Exchange: Exchange Online Moderation approval requests via Actionable Messages
item.description:
The Exchange Online Moderation feature gives message moderators the ability to Approve or Reject sending a moderated message to its intended recipients via a special email message form that includes Approve and Reject buttons in the Outlook Desktop or Outlook on the web toolbar. However, the ability to approve or reject a moderated message currently isn't supported on Outlook for iOS, Outlook for Android, or Outlook for Mac. With this update to use Actionable Messages for moderation approval messages, moderators with mailboxes hosted in Exchange Online will now be able to approve or reject moderated messages via all the Microsoft email clients: from Outlook for Windows, Outlook for Mac, Outlook for iOS and Outlook for Android.
GA date: February CY2026

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places Management portal
item.description:
Places Admins can use a user-friendly interface to manage their Places directory data such as create, view and edit buildings, floors, sections, rooms and desks. #MicrosoftPlaces
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared tab in channel
item.description:
The Files tab in channels is now "Shared". In addition to files that are currently shown from document library, new experience will also show all the files and links shared in the channel conversations. This makes it easier to find content all in one place.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview: Microsoft Information Protection - Exact Data Match adding support for role-based access control (RBAC) for EDM upload authorization
item.description:
Microsoft has decided not to proceed with the capability to leverage RBAC to authorize users for uploading data to the Exact Data Match (EDM) service instead of leveraging the EDM_DataUploaders security group for authorization.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exact Data Match adding support for role-based access control (RBAC) for EDM upload authorization
item.description:
Customers will be able to choose to leverage RBAC to authorize users for uploading data to the Exact Data Match (EDM) service instead of leveraging the EDM_DataUploaders security group for authorization.
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Automatically display auto-mapped calendars
item.description:
Users will be able to automatically see their auto-mapped calendars when toggling from classic Outlook to the new. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Local PTZ for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows
item.description:
Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows will provide native Pan-Tilt-Zoom (PTZ) controls for connected cameras that support this capability. The feature will initially contain limited support for cameras with mechanical/optical PTZ, with digital PTZ to come in the future.
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Expanding access to Diagnostics to Compliance Administrator, Security Administrator and Organization Management
item.description:
We are expanding the access to Diagnostics beyond Global Admin to: Compliance Administrator, Security Administrator and Organization Management.
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365: eSignature Smart Tagging for Electronically Signed Documents
item.description:
Documents that have been electronically signed will now be automatically recognized and tagged as “Signed” upon upload to SharePoint. This enhancement also applies retroactively as existing e-signed files will be updated with the appropriate tags. To give users more visibility and control, we’re introducing two optional metadata columns for document libraries: Electronically Signed – Indicates whether a document has been eSigned. Signature Provider – Displays the service used for the eSignature. This feature is available exclusively to tenants with eSignature enabled, helping streamline compliance tracking and document management.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Custom search folders
item.description:
Users can create Custom Search Folders in Outlook to automatically surface emails that match specific criteria such as sender, subject keywords, categories, date ranges, among others. Search folders update in real time and give you a focused view of the messages that matter most, without moving them from their original location. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Chat for Outlook iOS and Android
item.description:
On phone devices, users currently access Copilot Chat in Outlook Mobile via a tab at the bottom of their screen (or in Apps). Outlook is introducing a new Copilot Chat overlay experience, allowing users to chat with Copilot while continuing to interact with their email, calendar, and contacts. This overlay will be context-aware—understanding what the user is viewing—so users can ask Copilot about the content on their screen. Users with M365 Copilot licenses will also benefit from Copilot’s ability to draw on Microsoft 365 Graph to provide richer, more personalized responses.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Additional granular RBAC controls to manage Antivirus, Firewall, BitLocker, and Endpoint Detection and Response endpoint security workloads
item.description:
Expanded granular RBAC controls to manage Endpoint Security workloads. The ‘Security baselines’ permission previously included all security policies and now all security workloads have their own permission set
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Support for multiple camera views and IntelliFrame from Teams Rooms on Windows in Teams webinar and structured meetings
item.description:
Multiple camera views and IntelliFrame (Multi-stream and cloud) from Teams Rooms on Windows are now available in Teams webinar and structured meetings with "Manage what attendees see" enabled. Organizers and presenters of these meetings can access intelligent camera views and bring them on the live stage for attendees. Available with Teams Rooms Pro.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Search for meetings
item.description:
You can now search by meeting name or participant, take direct actions like joining, RSVPing, or viewing recaps, and access a dedicated Meetings tab for a streamlined experience. These updates make it easier to find and act on meetings right from the search bar.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Emoji Reactions Workflows
item.description:
Seamlessly set up workflows started by emoji reactions in Teams. When a user reacts to a message with an emoji, the workflow will be kicked off to handle support tickets or start a helpdesk workflow.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - New Pulse customization options
item.description:
Authors will have new options when starting surveys, including choosing to send without pre-defining an audience, and feedback can instead be gathered by sharing a link that people can access the survey and respond through, sending a survey without a specified end date, allowing for longer-term data collection and multiple responses from recipients over time, and collecting identified responses, where answers are attributed to the person who submitted them.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Unread News Notifications in Connections
item.description:
Users will receive a weekly notification in the Connections apps in Microsoft Teams on mobile and desktop linking them to relevant SharePoint news that they might have missed in the preceding week. This unread news will be available in the "News" tab in the Connections app under the "unread" pill.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference an Excel file when creating a slide with Copilot for PowerPoint
item.description:
You can now reference an Excel file when you create a slide with Copilot for PowerPoint.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference an Excel file when creating a slide with Copilot for PowerPoint
item.description:
You can now reference an Excel file when you create a slide with Copilot for PowerPoint.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference an Excel file when creating a slide with Copilot for PowerPoint
item.description:
You can now reference an Excel file when you create a slide with Copilot for PowerPoint.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention: Collection Policies: Scope classifiers and activity to track on all Windows devices
item.description:
Allow customers to scope classification (SITs- Sensitive Information Types) and activities for scoped users on devices. Adding DoD/GCC/GCC high expected dates
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention- Separate role added for downloading the original file evidence for Endpoint
item.description:
Microsoft Purview has introduced a new separate role for downloading the original evidence for endpoint. It is applicable when you try to download the evidence using Purview or XDR portal.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Dashboard - Benchmarks
item.description:
Compare Copilot active usage with benchmarks in Copilot Dashboard. External benchmarks will provide a reference for how usage compares to other companies. Internal benchmarks will enable users to compare similar groups, within your company.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Enhanced eDiscovery Premium APIs
item.description:
With the changes in Purview eDiscovery experience, the API support for Premium eDiscovery cases is also undergoing enhancements to align with the UI experience. We have the following APIs in Beta currently which will be moved to Live V1 version and ready for end customer use Search Estimate Statistics Search Export Report Search Export Result Search Add to ReviewSet ReviewSet Export
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Open Teams' apps in new window
item.description:
Organize your work environment to fit your needs. Users can open Teams' apps, like Chat, Calls, Activity and more in separate windows, allowing users to view and interact with these apps simultaneously.
GA date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Advanced label-based protection for non-Office/PDF files with the Microsoft Purview Information Protection Client
item.description:
This feature enhances secure collaboration in your organization by using the Information Protection Filer Labeler and Viewer to apply protection from Endpoint DLP. Protected non-Office/PDF files preserve their native file format on-device and can be opened in third party applications. On egress from the machine, these files are protected as PFILEs.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Academy auto-save and drafting functionality
item.description:
Changes you make to new, draft, or published LPs are now saved automatically in the background. In addition, your updates are now saved in a draft state while editing a published LP until you are ready to publish. The live version stays untouched until you hit publish.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Configure auto-release for desks
item.description:
Admins can now configure desks so that users must check-in (within a configurable duration after desk reservation start time); if users do not check-in to the desk, the desk will auto-release and be made available for others to book. #MicrosoftPlaces
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365: Microsoft Places - Enhanced desk booking capabilities
item.description:
Microsoft 365 now offers the ability to book desks for durations smaller than whole day, book for multiple days at the same time, and delegates/EAs can book desks for their principals. #MicrosoftPlaces
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Find and book desks near colleagues
item.description:
The refreshed desk booking experience allows users to find where their colleagues are planning to sit on a map and book a desk nearby. Each user is in control and can decide whether to share their desk booking information with others. #MicrosoftPlaces
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Book desks from maps
item.description:
The refreshed desk booking experience supports desks configured individually or as part of a pool. It puts maps front and center, with support for fixtures, but continues to work without maps. The same experience will be accessible from the calendar (in New Outlook, Teams and OWA) and from the Places app (on the web, or as a Connected app in Teams and Outlook), and will adapt to mobile/small screens. #MicrosoftPlaces
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Select camera in pre-join and during meeting
item.description:
Users can select an internal or external camera, or keep it turned off, before joining or during Teams meetings.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Enhanced Copilot in Engage
item.description:
Copilot in Engage has now been integrated with M365,providing the same rich access to the M365 Graph, and helping you natively access Microsoft data in the flow of Engage. Alongside this update, you can expect improved AI-powered writing assistance that bring in email/chat/files data to help craft both the content and style of your message
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Ability to export policy settings
item.description:
Insider Risk Management will now supply the ability to export policy configuration settings into a CSV. Any user with admin permissions will be able to export the settings. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Chat - Teams chats in ContextIQ
item.description:
Users will be able to search for and select Teams chats in ContextIQ to scope their prompts in Copilot Chat.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Pulse series for continuous feedback supporting AI transformations and change management
item.description:
New Pulse series templates are being introduced that are tailored to supporting continuous feedback scenarios for high value use cases such as change management.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage – Engage content surfacing in Copilot results
item.description:
Community discussion posts from Viva Engage will surface in Copilot results.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal : Insider Risk Management – Bring your own detections
item.description:
Allow customers to bring their own user activity indicators from homegrown, SIEM/UEBA platforms, or other line-of-business applications, and leverage them in existing Insider Risk Management playbooks. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/insider-risk-management?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: June CY2023

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview Information Protection Tracking and Revocation - End-User Tracking and Revocation
item.description:
From the sensitivity menu, users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their protected files and revoke access when needed.
GA date: April CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Surveys Agent helps you build, run, and analyze surveys
item.description:
Surveys Agent is your expert companion in Microsoft 365 Copilot for building smarter surveys—start to finish. From crafting the survey, launching and collecting data, or analyzing results, Surveys Agent is there to guide you every step of the way. It’s like having a professional survey designer and data analyst at your fingertips—so you can focus on making confident, insight-driven decisions.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] View Index browser, schema and errors for Custom Connectors on MAC
item.description:
View index browser, schema, and the errors for custom connectors from the M365 Admin center for better troubleshooting.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Expanded Input Box on Copilot Chat
item.description:
Users will be able to expand the Input Box to a full screen view when they type long prompts with lengthy context or instructions. When users copy paste prompts from word editors the prompt box will maintain plain text formatting to sustain readability and review of the prompt.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite - Operational dashboard to gain insight on EPM status and elevations.
item.description:
The dashboard focuses EPM insights on rollout status as well as elevations in the environment and suggestions for new rules to create.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Enable policy tips for recipients when emailed as part of a distribution group
item.description:
This feature enables policy tips for recipients when emailed as part of a group. DG expansion refers to the process of expanding Distribution Groups (DG) to ensure all recipients are evaluated for Data Loss Prevention (DLP) rules. This feature allows organizations to evaluate rules based on recipients contained in distribution groups, increasing the confidence that users will receive relevant warnings while drafting emails with sensitive content.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Sharing with Copilot summary - Now supporting PowerPoint, Excel, PDFs, Images, and protected files
item.description:
The ability to include a Copilot summary when sharing a file now extends beyond Word web to cover PowerPoint (web), Excel (web), PDF, image and text files in OneDrive Web, SharePoint document libraries, and M365 File Viewer. You can even summarize protected or confidential files, preserving your sensitivity labels while getting instant overviews. These enhancements broaden your sharing toolkit, accelerate collaboration and keep your data secure.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Shared mailbox access for emails in Copilot Chat
item.description:
Users with shared mailbox access will be able to ground Copilot Chat conversations in shared mailboxes.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Calendar support for copying, cutting, and pasting events and appointments
item.description:
Customers can now copy, cut, and paste meetings and appointments on their calendar in the new Outlook using CTRL+C, CTRL+X, and CTRL+V keyboard shortcuts. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Grid keyboard navigation in calendar month view via arrow keys in new Outlook for Windows and Web
item.description:
When focused on the calendar grid, you will be able to navigate the time slots on the calendar via left/right/up/down arrow keys in month view. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Read-only access to contacts within a PST file in new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to browse and read contacts within a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Read-only access to calendars within a PST file in new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to browse and read calendars and events within a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Authoring with M365 Copilot
item.description:
Viva Pulse authors can now work with M365 Copilot to add a question, rewrite a question, and create a survey from scratch to quickly create and send their surveys to their teams to collect feedback. M365 Copilot can seamlessly capture the author's needs to recommend survey questions that fit their unique scenario.
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Device clean up rule
item.description:
This enables IT admins to clean up inactive devices from their tenant by providing capabilities of running these rules at a platform level.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative Notes and Loop Components for Microsoft 365 GCC High and DoD
item.description:
Teams Notes and Loop components are now available in Microsoft 365 GCC High and DoD environments, enabling real-time collaboration in chats and meetings. Loop components allow users to co-author tables, action items, and lists directly in chats, while Collaborative Notes let meeting attendees co-create and collaborate on their meeting agendas, notes, and action items. As Loop components, these features stay up-to-date across all shared locations, and assigned tasks automatically sync with Microsoft To Do and Planner for seamless task management.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Sort by category
item.description:
This adds the ability to sort by category in Outlook for Mac.
GA date: April CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search
item.description:
Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as Record ID, UserKey, UserType, and ClientIP.
GA date: March CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Support for PowerPoint live within Cloud Video Interop (CVI)
item.description:
This new functionality will provide CVI Partners with the ability to display still images when PowerPoint live content is being presented within a Microsoft Teams meeting. The PowerPoint presentation will then be displayed as video content, this will not include animations or embedded videos.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Scope delegated mailbox access for emails in Business Chat
item.description:
Scope Copilot queries in emails for delegated mailboxes.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Choose how many days of emails sync to your device for offline usage
item.description:
With the new sync window, you can choose how many days' worth of emails and attachments you want to download to your device so you can always access them even while offline.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Dynamic video tile resizing based on occupancy count from Teams Rooms on Android
item.description:
The room video tile dynamically adjusts size based on the number of people in the room. When one person is in the room, the tile matches the remote participant's size. With two or more people, the room tile expands to be four times larger. Admins can enable or disable the people count feature.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Preview and chat with Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint files in the Microsoft 365 Copilot app on iPhone
item.description:
When opening a Microsoft Word, Excel, or PowerPoint file in the Microsoft 365 Copilot app on iPhone, users will get a preview experience where they can use Copilot Chat to command and ask questions about the files directly in the preview. This enables immediate access to Copilot Chat in a user's file.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Preview and chat with Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint files in the Microsoft 365 Copilot app on iPhone
item.description:
When opening a Microsoft Word, Excel, or PowerPoint file in the Microsoft 365 Copilot app on iPhone, users will get a preview experience where they can use Copilot Chat to command and ask questions about the files directly in the preview. This enables immediate access to Copilot Chat in a user's file.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Custom font and theme support for Viva Amplify
item.description:
Viva Amplify now supports custom themes and fonts published to Brand Center, empowering communicators to align their campaigns with brand identity and visual consistency across channels like Outlook and SharePoint.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Dashboard - Enhanced scope drilldown
item.description:
Leaders and managers can drilldown and explore data in Copilot Dashboard by indirect groups, unlocking a new layer of visibility into Copilot adoption and impact.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Data Loss Prevention to restrict Microsoft 365 Copilot processing on emails with sensitivity labels
item.description:
Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention (DLP) is extended to preventing Microsoft 365 Copilot from processing emails with sensitivity labels. This feature will allow DLP policies to provide detection of sensitivity labels in emails as enterprise grounding data and restrict access of the labeled emails in Microsoft 365 Copilot chat experiences. This feature only works for emails on or after 1/1/2025.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Investigations
item.description:
Microsoft Purview Data Security Investigations empowers data security teams to find and mitigate data risk from sensitive data exposure using generative AI-powered deep content analysis enriched with activity signals.
GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Referenced sources are cited in drafted content
item.description:
When drafting content that's based on referenced sources, Copilot includes citations in the text it generates, indicating references to information in the content.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Referenced sources are cited in drafted content
item.description:
When drafting content that's based on referenced sources, Copilot includes citations in the text it generates, indicating references to information in the content.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Use Copilot to select and rewrite specific pieces of text in an email in classic Outlook for Windows
item.description:
In classic Outlook for Windows, when composing an email, customers can select portions of text in an email and use Copilot to rewrite it. Users can give detailed instructions on how to rewrite and also able to modify tone and length.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Headlines report in Advanced Insights
item.description:
Insights analysts and leaders are interested in finding highlights and opportunities in their Copilot adoption data, but it can be time-consuming to find the groups that are experiencing dramatic trends or have much higher or lower Copilot usage than expected. Copilot Headlines shows an analyst where interesting things are happening in their data by automatically scanning a query and looking for outliers, changes over time, and differences from dynamic internal benchmarks. Analysts receive the headlines in a Power BI report as a table, along with supporting visualizations to help explore and validate the results.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Collection policies support in IRM
item.description:
With this update, IRM will start supporting collection policies. Collection policies allow customers to scope classification (SITs - Sensitive Information Types) and activities for scoped users. For device indicators based IRM policy, required collection policies will be automatically created in the background. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Malicious URL Protection for Teams Chat and Channels
item.description:
Microsoft Teams can now detect and warn users on malicious URLs sent in Teams chat and channels, increasing protection against malware attacks.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Weaponizable File Type Protection for Teams Chat and Channels
item.description:
Microsoft Teams now blocks messages containing weaponizable file types, such as executables, in chats and channels, increasing protection against malware and other file-based attacks.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Cloud IntelliFrame support on Teams Rooms on Android
item.description:
Now Cloud IntelliFrame, the AI-based cloud technology that optimizes views of in-room participants for hybrid meetings, is available for Teams Rooms on Android using group framing. It is set as the default in those rooms, while remaining disabled by default in others. Admins can manage this behavior through console settings.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite - Unattended Remote Help for Windows - Remote Sign-in
item.description:
Remotely access devices over the cloud without requiring end user involvement by signing in with credentials.
GA date: January CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite - Support approvals can now be requested by non-primary users of a device.
item.description:
We're updating Endpoint Privilege Management to allow users who are not assigned as the primary user of a device to initiate support approval requests. Previously, these requests would fail, but with this change, they will be processed successfully.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Summarize email attachments with Copilot in classic Outlook for Windows
item.description:
Copilot users will now be able to summarize PDF, Word, and PowerPoint email attachments in classic Outlook for Windows.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Drag and drop files between accounts as attachments
item.description:
You will now be able to drag emails and files from one account and drop them in another account as attachments in the new Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Organizers reply privately to individuals
item.description:
Allows Engage event organizers to answer questions from specific attendees without displaying the reply to the other participants. This capability can be helpful for sensitive questions, personal inquiries, or follow-up discussions that are not intended to be broadcast to the entire audience.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Viva Engage - Export event posts
item.description:
Organizers & co-organizers can now download all event questions (within the past 28 days) —including status, source, timestamps, upvotes and reactions—in a .csv file for easy filtering, analysis, and sharing. The option to export questions is available by default, if there is at least one question posted, on the event page.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Advanced Page Analytics
item.description:
SharePoint page analytics will add enhanced reporting capabilities including long-term data, distribution channel filtering, and reactions and promotions, data exports.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Ability to Disagree with Microsoft submissions analysis
item.description:
We are enabling the ability for SOC and admins to disagree with submission responses within the Submission experience and provide feedback to Microsoft on false negatives and false positives.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting option suggestions in classic Outlook for Windows
item.description:
Classic Outlook for Windows will suggest meeting options based on your meeting details, helping you easily schedule meetings with optimized settings from within the scheduling form.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Loop workspaces for Microsoft 365 GCC
item.description:
Loop workspaces and the full Loop app experience are available to Microsoft 365 GCC customers at loop.cloud.microsoft.
GA date: March CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Introduction of secure workflow to bypass legal holds and retention policies in Exchange
item.description:
The first release of Priority cleanup enables admins to create a recurring exception to delete items under a broader retention policy and/or legal hold on Exchange workload. Creating a Priority cleanup will require a separate security role, multiple approvers, and will have a complete audit trail
GA date: August CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite - Endpoint Privilege Management on single session Azure Virtual Desktop
item.description:
With this release, you can use Endpoint Privilege Management elevation rules and policy to more easily manage standard users on Azure Virtual Desktop.
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Enterprise Application Insights for SharePoint sites
item.description:
Enterprise Application Insights is a powerful report which helps SharePoint Administrators to discover all the SharePoint sites that are allowed access by third-party applications registered in your tenant. The report also provides details on the application's permission and requests count to help admins take further action to strengthen the security of the site. It is part of SharePoint Advanced Management capabilities.
GA date: November CY2025
Preview date: January CY2025

item.title: Updated Admin Controls
item.description:
Admin controls have been updated for enterprise customers to better manage the new unified video experience, onboarding new admin policies that allows admins to manage video creation and distribution features across platforms.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite - Microsoft Tunnel - Gateway Scaling
item.description:
Increase the number of clients supported per Tunnel gateway server from 5,000 to over 20,000 per server.

GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New cmdlet for Content Explorer (U.S. Government clouds)
item.description:
We apologize for the inconvenience, but this item was updated to Rolling out incorrectly. Thank you for your patience. The Content Explorer Export feature has a limitation of exporting data only after drill down to specific location. This update will allow admins to use a new cmdlet within Security & Compliance PowerShell, Export-ContentExplorerData, to export all rows of data for the content that are scanned and shown on the Content Explorer.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Sharing Word, Excel, and PowerPoint local files through the new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
When users are in Microsoft Word, Excel, or PowerPoint apps, and they want to share a file that is saved locally in their device (not stored in a cloud location), the new Outlook for Windows will show up as a share target and they will be able to easily email the file. #newoutlookforwindows.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Windows enrollment attestation
item.description:
Physical Windows devices will be attested at enrollment that enrollment credentials are stored in the hardware of the device. Administrators can view device attestations in the new Device attestation status report and manually force attestation from that report.
GA date: November CY2025
Preview date: April CY2024

item.title: Microsoft CoPilot (Microsoft 365): List email attachments in M365 Copilot
item.description:
Users will be able to list the file attachments that they received or sent over email in M365 Copilot.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Introducing Viva Engage Role Management APIs on Microsoft Graph
item.description:
We’re excited to announce that Viva Engage Role Management APIs in Microsoft Graph are releasing soon.
