item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Review set query report
item.description:
Within a review set, generate and download a hit-by-term report on a KQL query. Quickly see the count and volume of the items hit on a particular keyword or a list of compound queries.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Syntex - Update to Microsoft Syntex translation
item.description:
The document translation service enables users to create translated copies quickly and easily while preserving the original format and structure of the file. We’re updating the service to allow creating translated copies in up to 10 languages with a single request. This update will be available for both manual and rule-based requests.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: SharePoint: Enhancing SharePoint document translation with glossary feature
item.description:
We’re thrilled to announce the addition of a glossary capability to our SharePoint AI content document translation model. This feature delivers precise, industry-specific translations, fostering unparalleled clarity and consistency for your documents. Experience effortless integration and user-friendly operation within your existing SharePoint libraries.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy tuning analysis for priority content-only policies
item.description:
Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time prediction of the number of users in a tenant that could potentially match a given set of policy conditions. With this update, policy tuning analysis will support insider risk policies that are scoped for priority content. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: May CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Service health dashboard
item.description:
As a Microsoft Purview user, you'll be able to view outages, service issues, and advisories that might impact your services. This new dashboard will combine the services and solutions health of Purview, Microsoft 365 services, and Azure Cloud Services in one central place in the Purview portal, eliminating the need to go to several places to find this information.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updates to Copilot Chat response output
item.description:
Easily interact with Microsoft Graph content represented by bolder references, new action bar, and more.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker attribution now “On” by default in BYOD rooms with enhanced admin controls
item.description:
New PowerShell setting (SpeakerAttributionBYOD in csTeamsAIPolicy), enabled by default, gives IT admins more control over speaker attribution in BYOD (bring your own device) meeting rooms. This enhances the experience for users by enabling clear speaker labels and richer in-meeting and post-meeting insights with Microsoft 365 Copilot. Users just enroll profiles via Teams Settings to be recognized.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Read aloud available in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat
item.description:
Play back Copilot responses as audio with read aloud in Copilot Chat.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Dictate your prompts in Copilot Chat
item.description:
Use the dictation button to input your prompts with speech.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Unified video branded start page
item.description:
This creates a unified Clipchamp and Stream start page that serves as a single video destination of creation, consumption, and discovery.
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Optical character recognition (OCR) - Support for embedded images in files including Office files in SharePoint and OneDrive
item.description:
Optical character recognition (OCR) scanning enables Microsoft Purview to scan images for sensitive information. With Embedded support, OCR will scan content in DOCX, PPTX, XLSX and PDFs (scanned and hybrid containing searchable text and images). This will be in addition to support for standalone images
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Usage reports - Message consumption for Pay-as-you-go experiences in Copilot Chat.
item.description:
A new report to help IT admins manage costs for billed messages that are Pay-as-you-go enabled for Copilot Chat. Reporting includes drill down of billed messages per user, per billing policy, per agent-level and agent-user level pair.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI- additional Microsoft Copilot integrations
item.description:
Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI support for Fabric Copilot and Security Copilot.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - MIP auto-labeling for Azure SQL & Storage
item.description:
Extend your sensitivity labels to specific or all subscriptions within Azure Storage and Azure SQL Server via auto-labeling policy. Clearly define labeling conditions for data sources beyond M365 without fear of it interfering with existing M365 files configurations.
GA date: November CY2025
Preview date: July CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Tracking and Revocation in Compliance Portal
item.description:
Users can access the Microsoft Purview compliance portal to check who has tried accessing their sensitivity labeled and encrypted local Office files and revoke access when needed.

GA date: April CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Quick steps in the pop-out ribbon
item.description:
Quick Steps are now integrated into the ribbon of email pop-out ribbon in the new Outlook for Windows and Web. Users can access and execute their configured Quick Steps directly while reading emails in separate windows. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Copilot Proactive Drafts
item.description:
Copilot will detect emails that are most likely to need a response and pre-generate three options for you review and select from. Save time and energy responding to high priority emails with proactive drafts.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365: New Trust Center settings to block file opens using insecure protocols
item.description:
New settings in Trust Center will allow users to restrict or allow file opens using FTP/HTTP protocols and fallback to FrontPage Remote Procedure Call (FPRPC) protocol.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - User Schema Enhancements- Create and Edit Hierarchies
item.description:
This feature enables Viva Glint admins to create and edit hierarchies directly within the platform. It empowers admins to easily update and maintain the structure of user data without requiring support.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updated UI for Microsoft 365 Copilot App
item.description:
The Microsoft 365 Copilot app is your starting place for AI at work, offering quick access to secure AI chat, search, files, and content creation in one seamless app.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel with Python for GCC
item.description:
Copilot in Excel gains powerful new insights and visualizations with Advanced Analysis. Explore your data in a natural, conversational way, while Copilot does the heavy lifting using Python, a rich programming language that supercharges what is possible in your spreadsheets.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Posture Management for AI
item.description:
Microsoft Purview AI Hub has been rebranded to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI (DSPM for AI). Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: New email indicators to alert on exfiltration of business sensitive data to free public
item.description:
In this update, we are adding two new email indicators to Insider Risk Management. 1. Sending email with attachments to free public domains: This alerts when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to a free public domain email, potentially leading to a data security incident. 2. Sending email with attachments to self: This alerts when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to user's personal email account or emailing self, potentially leading to a data security incident. Admins with appropriate permissions can enable these indicators from the settings page and use these new indicators in the data leaks or data theft policy template. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: App ratings in in-context surfaces.
item.description:
Now users will be able to view ratings when they view apps within the in-context store in teams.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - New predicate in Email DLP - Detect number of domains/Recipients
item.description:
The "Recipient/Domain Count Over" feature, designed to address a critical need for managing and controlling the distribution of sensitive information via email. This feature allows organizations to set specific policies that trigger alerts or actions when the number of recipients or domains in outgoing emails exceeds a defined threshold. By implementing this feature, organizations can enhance data security, ensure compliance with regulatory requirements, and prevent unauthorized data dissemination, providing peace of mind and safeguarding sensitive information.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Chat now offers meeting series selection on CIQ Menu
item.description:
Users will now be able to select meeting series and related instances from CIQ to submit as part of their prompts to Copilot Chat.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: OneDrive: Sync admin reports - bulk data export
item.description:
Support for bulk export of device status, including username, sync app version, known folders, last sync date, and sync errors.

GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: July CY2024

item.title: Word: Automatic summary of documents on file-open in Word
item.description:
When you open a document, Copilot will generate a summary in the Word window. You can hide the summary or open the Copilot chat pane to ask specific questions about the document.
GA date: August CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat general availability for GCC
item.description:
Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat Copilot is available at no additional cost for Microsoft 365 GCC users who sign in with their Microsoft Entra account (no Microsoft 365 Copilot license required). Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat offers enterprise data protection (EDP), and secure AI chat designed for work, powered by the latest large language models with optional web grounding. The general availability of this release will be delivered to the users with web grounding OFF by default to meet US Government requirements. This will help protect sensitive information which should not leave the GCC compliance boundary.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/copilot/overview
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced content extraction and file type coverage for DLP on Windows devices
item.description:
With this release, the file type coverage to scan, classify and protect sensitive content on windows endpoint devices with Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention policies will increase from current ~40 file types to 100+ file types. This release will make the coverage of file types on endpoint consistent with other locations such as Exchange, SharePoint and OneDrive. This will also include other enhancements like detecting label from pfile, detecting sensitive content in metadata, and detecting sensitive content in PDF forms.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Improved Python-powered answers in Copilot in Excel
item.description:
Copilot in Excel now provides improved direct answers to your data analysis questions, using Python.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Access Copilot Chat in your Microsoft 365 apps
item.description:
Easily access Copilot Chat from the side pane in your Microsoft 365 apps with a commercial Microsoft 365 license or a Microsoft 365 Copilot license.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Meeting Audit Events in GCC
item.description:
Teams Audit Events for Meetings, including MeetingDetail and MeetingParticipantDetail, will soon be available in GCC. This enhancement will provide administrators with comprehensive insights into meeting activities, helping to ensure compliance and improve operational efficiency. MeetingDetail: Captures detailed information about meetings, including start and end times, meeting subject, and organizer details. MeetingParticipantDetail: Logs participant information, including join and leave times, participant roles, and any changes in participant status during the meeting. Audit logs are accessible through the Microsoft Purview portal, where administrators can search, filter, and export audit data for detailed analysis. These logs are essential for maintaining compliance, investigating incidents, and ensuring the security of Teams activities.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot can generate an audio overview of a notebook
item.description:
Copilot can turn the referenced files in a notebook into a dynamic audio overview, transforming them into a listening experience that’s easy to follow. To generate an audio overview in Copilot Notebooks, select ‘Generate audio overview’ at the top of the notebook. This capability is only available in English currently.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Find Text when reading email on Outlook on the Web and New Outlook for Windows
item.description:
The ability to find text when reading email on Outlook will be supported. This feature will bear resemblance to F4 on Outlook for Windows, or Ctrl+F in another apps. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Edge: Microsoft Edge for Business will soon integrate an entry point into Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat from the address bar
item.description:
Microsoft Edge for Business plans to introduce an easy way for users to get summaries of their open page from the address bar using Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat. This feature seeks to help users more easily understand relevant content and save time.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Posture Management for AI - Data Assessments
item.description:
Data assessments in Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI provides a way for admins to drive data security outcomes by viewing default assessments, reviewing the data sensitivity and user accesses on locations, and performing remediation actions to mitigate risk.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Move to in the pop-out ribbon in New Outlook and Outlook for Web
item.description:
The "Move To" option is now available in the pop-out ribbon in New Outlook and Outlook for Web, making it easier to organize emails. Quickly move messages to any folder without switching back to the main window. This update ensures a seamless and consistent email management experience. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Move to in the pop-out ribbon in New Outlook and Outlook for Web
item.description:
The "Move To" option is now available in the pop-out ribbon in New Outlook and Outlook for Web, making it easier to organize emails. Quickly move messages to any folder without switching back to the main window. This update ensures a seamless and consistent email management experience. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Extensibility - Admins can manage Copilot extensibility under Copilot tab in Microsoft 365 admin center
item.description:
Admins have options to manage Copilot extensibility under Copilot tab including agent management for IT published agents and shared agents.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention: Enrich the details of the auto forwarded emails in the Exchange DLP
item.description:
We are excited to introduce an enhancement to our system that will provide more accurate and detailed information for forwarded emails. This new feature will ensure that the correct user, recipient information, and email evidence are displayed in the alert generated. This improvement will help admins accurately trace the origin and intended recipient of forwarded emails, reducing confusion and minimizing the risk of false positives. The update will be reflected in our audit logs, alerts page, and activity explorer page
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Paste to Browser prevention support on macOS device with endpoint DLP
item.description:
Microsoft Purview Endpoint Data Loss Prevention adds support for instances where users try to paste sensitive content into a web browser on macOS devices using Edge, Safari, and other browsers.
GA date: April CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Online archive for shared mailboxes in the new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
Online archive mailboxes will appear in the folder pane alongside other accounts, making it easier to access archived content for shared mailboxes. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - IRM alerts in XDR
item.description:
With this feature, IRM alerts and other supporting data will be available in the following Microsoft Defender XDR experiences: 1. IRM alerts will be surfaced in unified alert and Incident queue in Microsoft Defender XDR. 2. IRM alerts, Indicators, and enriched events will be available in Microsoft Defender XDR advanced hunting. Analysts can leverage KQL queries to identify potentially hidden risky patterns in data security related user activity. 3. IRM alert, Indicators, and enriched events will be exposed through Graph API. This feature can be enabled through “Share data with Microsoft Defender XDR” within Microsoft Insider Risk Management settings. To ensure privacy of the data, all IRM data in Microsoft Defender XDR can only be accessed by users with Insider risk analyst or Insider risk investigator permissions in Purview. Existing analysts accessing IRM data in purview will continue to access IRM data in Microsoft Defender XDR. IRM data in Microsoft Defender XDR does not honor anonymization. This is to enable effective correlation of IRM alerts with alerts from other solutions in Microsoft Defender XDR platform (such as Defender for Endpoint, Defender for Cloud apps, etc.). Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention – Restrict access action support for sematic models and lakehouses in Fabric
item.description:
Your organization can now control who can access your data depending on the sensitive information detected in Fabric semantic models and lakehouses. DLP restrict access action allows you to block access to guest users or all users depending on what labels or sensitive information types matches your semantic models or lakehouses. This is in addition to the ability already supported by DLP policies to audit and notify users via Policy Tips based on sensitive content within Fabric semantic models and lakehouses.
GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Alert improvements
item.description:
This feature is about improving the alerting capabilities and customization in Communication Compliance.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - CMK (Customer Managed Keys) encryption support for data at-rest in Review sets
item.description:
This release of eDiscovery features the implementation of customer-managed key (CMK) options, allowing users to manage their own encryption keys for the data stored in eDiscovery review sets in addition to the default, strong Microsoft-managed encryption already in place.
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Document snapshot in Word personalizes output
item.description:
The document snapshot helps the user focus faster by surfacing the most important information for them based on their personal context.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Preview of multiple camera view in Teams Rooms on Windows
item.description:
When multiple camera views are enabled in Teams Rooms on Windows, the preview video on the front-of-room display and the camera settings dialog will show multiple camera views. This feature allows in-room users to be aware of all camera streams that are simultaneously streaming to remote users. This feature is available with the Teams Rooms Pro license.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Content suggestions in Word
item.description:
Select the Suggestions tab within the Copilot summary at the top of a Word document for suggestions on improving the content of the document.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Windows 365: Frontline in Shared mode availability for Germany West Central, Korea Central, Korea South
item.description:
Windows 365 Frontline in Shared Mode is expanding to Korea Central & Germany West Central, helping frontline workers in these regions to securely share Cloud PCs across shifts.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Countdown Timer for Teams Meetings
item.description:
Manage time and streamline meeting discussions with the new countdown timer for Teams meetings, a tool designed to keep meetings efficient and on schedule. Any user can easily add a timer of any duration to the meeting (up to 100 minutes), which will appear in the meeting window for all participants with controls to start, stop, pause, and add more time. Colors automatically change as the timer gets closer to zero to help keep the speaker on track.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Improved interaction in the subject header section on Outlook on the Web and New Outlook for Windows
item.description:
The subject header section that shows up at the top when reading an email will be improved. This includes the component that contains meeting information when looking at a meeting invitation and other similar components. The subject header section will be more sensitive to available space and allow for a more comfortable reading experience when on smaller screens or on displays with high scale factors. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Priva Privacy Management – Multicloud environments
item.description:
Microsoft Priva Privacy Risk Management extends its overexposure policies into data contained in Azure SQL, Azure Data Lake Storage, and Amazon S3. Organizations can create privacy policies that specify which data sources, databases, or storage buckets are in scope and Priva will automatically notify data asset owners when matches are detected.
GA date: January CY2026
Preview date: June CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Administrative units support
item.description:
Administrative units allow admins with appropriate permissions to subdivide the organization into smaller units, and then assign specific admins or role groups that can manage only the members of those units. For example, German administrators can only create/manage policies for only German users, and German investigators can only investigate alerts and activities from only German users. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Adaptive scopes
item.description:
Ability to target IRM policies using global Adaptive Scopes. Adaptive scopes within IRM policies allow admins to use existing adaptive scopes created on the Microsoft Purview compliance portal within IRM policies, Adaptive scopes can be created using queries to define user groups dynamically. This feature provides more powerful targeting for policies, allowing different settings to be assigned to users based on attributes from Entra ID without the administrative burden of creating and maintaining groups. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: April CY2025
Preview date: August CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Power Automate integration (U.S. Government clouds)
item.description:
Initiate a Power Automate workflow when the item reaches the end of its retention period. For example, execute a complex disposition approval process or move the file to an archive.
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management: New retention actions in Power Automate integration (U.S. Government clouds)
item.description:
We will release additional retention actions as part of the Power Automate integration with Microsoft Purview Records Management. You can now relabel a file or an email at the end of its retention period or apply a retention label to a file in SharePoint. You can also delete items in SharePoint, OneDrive, or Exchange with all executed retention actions recorded in the Microsoft Purview Audit log.
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Minecraft Education: Update v1.21.9
item.description:
The "Chase the Clouds" update for Minecraft Education, bringing the version to 1.21.9.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Custom CC policy as IRM indicator
item.description:
IRM admins can now select any Communication Compliance (CC) Policy alerts as indicators in IRM policies. After this rollout, IRM admins can select any custom CC policies that they would like to bring into IRM and detect if a user has alerts for these CC policies. When an IRM alert is generated, admins can review if there are any alerts for the user within CC under the policies that are enabled as indicators. This feature will help admins and analysts view this information in IRM without switching to CC. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity labels protection policy support for Azure Storage
item.description:
Label-based protection support is now possible for Azure Data Lake Gen 2 and Azure Blob storage, all within Microsoft Purview information Protection. You may already know how to protect Microsoft 365 data like documents or emails with sensitivity labels, and you will now be able to apply these labels and the related protections to these additional sources. In addition, you will have a consistent framework for your sensitive information by allowing your existing label scheme and extending it to apply within these sources.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Import Non-M365 data into review set for modern eDiscovery
item.description:
Microsoft Purview modern eDiscovery experience now enables legal and compliance teams to import non-Microsoft 365 data directly into review set as part of the modern eDiscovery workflow. This feature allows organizations to consolidate all their data into a single secure review environment for streamlined review.
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Overview dashboard
item.description:
We are introducing a new Overview dashboard to help customers understand how our product effectively protects their organization environment and digital assets. The overview dashboard focuses on showcasing the effectiveness of our tools, how customers can further amplify this effectiveness and our product’s leading position in comparison to the other non-Microsoft security solutions out there.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Include missing survey takers
item.description:
This feature enables a Glint Admin to create surveys for participants who were not originally included in a live survey. With this update, the admin can modify the distribution list within the survey program settings and generate surveys for the newly added participants.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Add cycles to a custom blank recurring program
item.description:
This feature enables Glint Admins to add cycles to programs created using the "custom blank recurring" program type. Previously unavailable, this capability is now supported for both existing and newly created programs.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Town hall screen management privileges in Teams Rooms on Windows
item.description:
When the Teams Room on Windows is a co-organizer or a presenter in a town hall, privileges can be granted to start or end the event, manage what attendees see, and promote attendees as presenters, ensuring a smoother and more organized event experience. This feature is available with Teams Rooms Pro.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Access: Add zoom slider magnification to Microsoft Access
item.description:
Access will add magnification slider (10% to 500%) in lower right of the application, similar to the feature in Word, PowerPoint, and Excel. It will also be keyboard accessible and available on the ribbon.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Access: Modernize Access Forms and Reports to work well on Large Format Monitors
item.description:
Remove the 22-inch size limit and modernize Access forms and reports work well on large format monitors and provide responsive behavior for different form factors.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Auto-Export mailbox to PST file in new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to schedule an export of an entire mailbox (emails, calendars, and contacts) or a specific mailbox folder to a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Export mailbox to PST file in new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to export an entire mailbox (emails, calendars, and contacts) or a specific mailbox folder to a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Export mailbox to PST file in new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to export an entire mailbox (emails, calendars, and contacts) or a specific mailbox folder to a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Send messages to attendees in the meeting lobby with lobby chat
item.description:
Now meeting organizers can send one-way messages to attendees in the lobby via the lobby chat. The Lobby chat is intended to optimize the lobby experience for all participants, ensuring that organizers are better equipped to run external meetings, have more control over meetings with external participants, and external attendees are well informed about the meeting upon meeting start.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Delegates can now create new categories for the account owner's Calendar
item.description:
Delegates can now create new categories on behalf of the person who granted them permissions. They can also apply said categories to the Calendar of that same person who granted them permissions. Delegates can view the list of the delegator's Categories by visiting the Accounts > Categories page of the Settings window and selecting the delegator's account from the dropdown. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Conditional branching in Microsoft Lists forms
item.description:
Microsoft Lists forms will enable users to create dynamic forms featuring branching and conditional logic. This update allows users to customize their forms to display relevant questions based on conditions applied to previous responses, empowering them to design smarter forms that adapt to their data collection needs.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Add emails as attachments while composing an email on Outlook for iOS and Android
item.description:
Now while you are composing in Outlook for iOS or Android, you can use the same attach option you already know to select and attach emails to your mail.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Co-organizer updates in town hall
item.description:
Co-organizers can edit town hall details, publish the event, and cancel the event, similar to the organizer.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Modern SharePoint Page Templates
item.description:
The Modern SharePoint Page Templates feature introduces a new Template Gallery, providing users with a centralized hub to discover, preview, and select from over 50 modern out-of-the-box (OOB) templates and custom templates. This feature empowers users to create high-quality, on-brand pages effortlessly, enhancing productivity while ensuring consistency and visual appeal across SharePoint sites. Key highlights: Template Gallery: Centralized hub to access both Saved on this site (custom templates) and From Microsoft (OOB templates). 50+ new OOB templates: A collection of aesthetically pleasing, professional, and easy-to-use templates that empower users to quickly create visually engaging and consistent content for common use cases like status updates, event announcements, and team introductions.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Town halls in DoD
item.description:
Set up and host large scale events across a DoD organization with the familiar Teams app you use for meetings using town hall. Town hall capabilities include a new meeting template, capacity for up to 20k attendees, green room, the ability to manage what attendees see, RTMP-in, live translated captions, and more.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Easily select a template while you create a new PowerPoint presentation with Copilot
item.description:
When creating a new presentation with Copilot in PowerPoint, choose a template from your organization's collection for on-brand presentations, or select from Microsoft's handpicked templates, ensuring the new presentation is built as per your chosen template.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Catch up on a summary of document comments in the top of your document
item.description:
Copilot will have a Discussion tab in the top of your document to summarize open comments, helping you quickly understand what people have said in comments.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery enhancements
item.description:
We are introducing several enhancements to the eDiscovery modernized user interface. These updates include a comprehensive case-level data source view, the ability to retry failed locations for a more complete search statistics estimate. Users will also be able to duplicate search and copy search from hold or hold from search within the same case, reusing the data sources and queries. Additionally, customers will be able to access a more comprehensive reporting in all process reports including information like compliance boundary, encryption settings and more.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - SharePoint storage insights, actions, and resources
item.description:
A new Storage tab will be added to usage report for SharePoint within the Microsoft 365 admin center. The new tab will provide visibility into storage quota consumption, a usage trend, and recommended actions and resources for storage management and optimization
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Labeling improvement for non-Office/PDF files using endpoint DLP
item.description:
This allows the customer to use a label for a non-Office/PDF file without productivity impact.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Presenter joins Townhalls via dial-in
item.description:
Now, with a Public Switched Telephone Network (PSTN) code provided in the town hall share event dialog, organizers can share these codes with presenters. With these codes, presenters will join as an attendee and promoted to a presenter to join either the green room or the live session.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Optional connected experiences privacy setting
item.description:
This rollout introduces the privacy setting for "Turn on optional connected experiences" in Outlook on the web which is available in other Office apps today. The setting is found under Settings > General > Privacy and data > Privacy settings.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Scheduled prompts
item.description:
Plan ahead by scheduling essential prompts for repeated tasks in Copilot chat. Create a productive routine that helps you stay organized and efficient.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

item.title: OneDrive: Ask Copilot questions on meeting recordings
item.description:
Select a meeting recording in your OneDrive and ask Copilot to recap the meeting, highlight parts where you were mentioned, or recommend action items and next steps. This feature requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license and will be available to commercial customers on OneDrive Web.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse – Integration into Viva Glint Dashboard
item.description:
Enable managers and leaders to gather additional information and check in on team progress after an org-wide Glint survey. By leveraging a Pulse survey that recommends questions based on the top strengths and opportunities identified in the org-wide Glint survey, managers and leaders can gather a timely understanding of the team’s progress to-date in addressing key focus areas, make mid-point adjustments if needed, and maintain momentum in their efforts to improve engagement and employee experience.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage supports 14 more languages
item.description:
Viva Engage now supports 14 additional languages (listed below), making the platform more accessible to global users. This update allows employees to engage in their preferred language, helping improve communication across multilingual teams. Users can navigate to their settings in Viva Engage and choose their preferred language in the drop down under 'Language' settings. The new languages are - 1. Arabic 2. Vietnamese 3. Serbian (Latin) 4. Slovak 5. Croatian 6. Hebrew 7. Slovenian 8. Lithuanian 9. Estonian 10. Bulgarian 11. Latvian12. English (United Kingdom) 13. Spanish (Mexico) 14. French (Canada)
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365: M365 Archive Search
item.description:
M365 Archive will introduce new search capabilities that allow end-users to easily identify archived content. This feature aims to improve productivity by making archived data searchable by end users so they can identify which site needs to be reactivated.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: M365/SharePoint Agent Insights for SharePoint Administrators
item.description:
Rich insights on SharePoint agents for content governance as part of SharePoint Advanced Management controls.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal : MDM-independent support for Endpoint DLP on MacOS devices
item.description:
Endpoint DLP is extending support to MacOS devices independent of the MDM solution used to deploy (previously supported through JAMF or Intune).
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Discovery of sensitive data sharing to any cloud application or website (inc. GenAI) via network layer
item.description:
With this update, IRM will support the discovery of sensitive files and text shared to any cloud application or website (inc. GenAI) via network layer. This capability is based on integration with 3rd party network partners (with data being captured via network layer). Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Generative AI apps activities as triggers in IRM
item.description:
With this update, the generative AI apps indicators will be supported as triggers in Risky AI usage policy. With triggers, customers can define the conditions for bringing the user into the scope of a policy while the generative AI apps indicators are used to determine risk score. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite - Improved elevation detection
item.description:
This improvement expands the types of elevation actions in Windows that EPM can detect and control elevation for.
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: August CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Enhanced device inventory for Apple and Android devices
item.description:
Gain more inventory information about your Apple and Android devices.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Edge: AI theme generator
item.description:
Microsoft Edge will include an AI theme generator, that allows users to input a text prompt and generate a series of images to preview as browser themes. Applying the theme includes setting the generated image on the Edge new tab page, and applying the image's dominant color to the browser frame. Admins can restrict access to this feature using the AIGenThemesEnabled policy.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Customize visuals and pages in embedded PowerBI reports
item.description:
Analysts can now use embedded PowerBI edit tools to customize their reports to add visuals, pages and change themes, text and more, and then publish it to their organization.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Site attestation
item.description:
Site attestation policy is the newest addition to the site lifecycle management suite. It is a one-stop solution to ensure your sites are secure and compliant by reducing the risk of unmanaged sites. This involves regular reviews by site owners or admins to check and confirm the accuracy of site information, including the site's necessity, its owners, members, permissions, and sharing settings. You can also choose to automate actions on sites that remain unattested for more than 3 months to prevent risks of content over exposure.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot: Microsoft 365 Copilot Interaction Export API
item.description:
The new Microsoft 365 Copilot Interaction Export API enable customers and ISVs to export Copilot interaction data for processing in their security and compliance (S+C) applications. This new Interaction Export API captures the user prompts and Copilot responses in the Copilot private interactions and provide insights into the resources Copilot has accessed to generate the response. It will be available in Public Cloud for General Availability.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: AI assistant for admins in the Pro Management portal
item.description:
IT admins can optimize their time and resources by utilizing the Pro Management Portal AI assistant. It offers comprehensive answers to questions about Teams meeting spaces and management solutions and delivers data and insights specific to inventory in the organization’s environment. This feature is available with Teams Rooms Pro and does not require a Microsoft 365 Copilot license.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] Discover agent in Microsoft Copilot on iOS/Android
item.description:
Agent has been released to Desktop/Web Copilot and now we are enabling Agent UX in mobile endpoints. It will allow end-users to discover installed agents, add new agents and chat with them in mobile Copilot on Teams, Outlook and Microsoft 365 Copilot App (formerly Microsoft 365 App).
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 App: Availability of the Cloud Policy service for Microsoft 365 Government GCC-H and DoD
item.description:
The Cloud Policy service allows Microsoft 365 administrators to configure policies for Microsoft 365 apps and assign these policies using Microsoft 365 or Entra ID groups. Once configured, these policies are automatically enforced as users sign in and use Microsoft 365 apps and services. The initial release will support policies for Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise on Windows and future updates will bring support for additional applications and platforms. For additional information about the Cloud Policy service, refer to "Overview of the Cloud Policy service for Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise".
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365-apps/admin-center/overview-cloud-policy
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Reply and forward emails in a PST file in new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to reply and forward emails in a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance center: Insider Risk Management - Policy scoping enhancements
item.description:
After further review, we continue rolling this out. We apologize for any inconvenience. With this release, Insider Risk Management administrators can include or exclude specific users, groups, and adaptive scopes within policies. We are also adding support for non-mail enabled Security Groups within IRM policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Integrate Chat notification with Meeting RSVP status
item.description:
Microsoft Teams users will be able to control how they get notified in meeting chats through RSVP to their meetings. When you decline a meeting, you will not receive notifications or see the chats in chat list; when you accept a meeting, you will receive notification for all new messages.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - New workload for Copilot in Content Explorer
item.description:
With this change, customers will start seeing a new Copilot location within the Content Explorer. This will have all the sensitive information which is present in Copilot conversations
GA date: April CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - User exclusion
item.description:
After further review, we continue rolling this out. We apologize for any inconvenience. This introduces the ability to exclude users and groups from IRM policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: OneDrive: Sync admin reports - GCC-H and DoD
item.description:
We are adding support for the OneDrive Sync admin reports for the GCC-H and DoD environments.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI Apps and agents
item.description:
Apps and agents in Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI apps enables administrators to view a dashboard of agents used across the organization and identify and manage any potential data security risks. Administrators can access detailed insights into sensitive data that specific agents have accessed and see how these agents are protected by Purview data security policies. The detailed agent view also indicates what policies are applied to the agent and provides the option for administrators to create a policy directly from this view to address any coverage gaps.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Site default labeling for SharePoint Online and Copilot
item.description:
This new capability further integrates SharePoint Online with Purview sensitivity labeling. SharePoint Online document library owners can set a new type of default label on the library, which automatically applies that label to all unprotected Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and PDF files within the library. This simplifies labeling in bulk across document libraries in an organization, enriches DLP and Copilot with signal to allow admins to monitor and restrict access to this content, and enables inheritance of sensitivity labels to output artifacts in Copilot.
GA date: September CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot advanced text analysis in Excel
item.description:
Copilot can now analyze text by identifying themes or sentiments, cite examples in the data, and insert a column with theme/sentiment labels.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Data Loss Prevention- Gain DLP policy insights with Security Copilot
item.description:
Copilot for Security in DLP can summarize DLP policies. This enhancement enables DLP admins to gain insights on coverage of policies viz. location, classifiers and notifications, and more. DLP admins can get these insights on all the policies or on few selected policies. They will be able to use prompts to gain deeper level view of how a policy is configured for their digital landscape. This helps them align their data posture on a regular basis and make corrections to policy posture as needed.
GA date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Entra: Conditional Access What If API
item.description:
Microsoft Entra Conditional Access What If API can be used to programmatically test the impact of conditional access policies on user and workload identity sign-ins.
GA date: December CY2024
Preview date: September CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Enable admins to set default document library label based on container label of a group/site/team
item.description:
This enables admins to inherit document library label from the container label of a group/site/team. New and edited documents within the default document library will be labeled automatically. If the SharePoint admin had already configured a default document library labeling, this setting will not override it.
GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Site ownership policy
item.description:
Site ownership policy is a one-stop solution to effectively manage ownership needs of all SharePoint sites in your tenant. It helps you to define your organization's ownership criteria and identify sites that are not compliant. You can further notify predefined set of users of your choice to find the next best site owner or admin. You can also choose to automate actions on sites that remain ownerless for more than 3 months to prevent risks of data mismanagement.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Forms: New user onboarding experience
item.description:
Introducing an upgraded onboarding experience tailored for new Forms users, designed to provide a seamless and user-friendly initiation to the platform. Get started effortlessly with our refreshed interface and streamlined features.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Enriching Insider risk management with Communication compliance as an indicator
item.description:
Enhance Insider Risk Management by incorporating communication compliance policy matches as a new indicator for detecting various communication risks, including inappropriate text. Additionally, our system now extends its capabilities to identify potential financial regulatory compliance breaches and violations of any custom communication compliance policy on Teams, Exchange, Yammer, Copilot for Microsoft 365, or third-party channels. This expansion ensures a comprehensive approach to risk detection in diverse communication scenarios.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Reduce detection to investigation time from 24 hours to 1 hour (U.S. Government clouds)
item.description:
This feature will reduce the detection to investigation time to under an hour, allowing your organization to respond promptly to policy violations. The alert will be reviewed by a policy investigator, who is explicitly granted permission to review policy alerts by the Communication Compliance admin role. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance-investigate-remediate?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Emoji picker in Viva Engage
item.description:
Enhance your posts in Viva Engage with the integrated emoji picker. No need to memorize shortcuts; just click the emoji icon in the command bar to express yourself with ease.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Named entity coverage for additional markets and languages
item.description:
Named entities are sensitive information types (SITs) that can’t easily be identified by a regular expression or a function; these include person names, physical addresses, and medical terms and conditions. This update expands name and address coverage to an additional 7 countries, such as China and Russia, and expands medical terms and conditions (specifically for the Diseases SIT) to an additional 29 languages covering much of Europe, China, Japan, and Korea.

GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Edge: Open external links in another profile when recommended by external applications
item.description:
When Microsoft Edge is set as the default browser to open external links from applications, Microsoft Edge must determine which profile to open the links. Users can control which profile to use through the “Default profile for external links” setting. Applications such as Microsoft Teams or Outlook can also recommend a profile for the links. Currently, the user setting is prioritized over application recommendations. With this feature, the application recommended profile is given priority, instead of the profile selected in the setting. Admins can control the availability of the feature using the “EdgeOpenExternalLinksWithAppSpecifiedProfile” policy.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Sharing a portion of a video as a clip
item.description:
Clipchamp allows authors and viewers alike to share a portion of a video without changing the original media. Using draggable handles on the playback timeline, a link containing the desired clip start and end is put on the clipboard for easy sharing. Opening this link will play only the specified clip, and viewers can easily pop out to view the full video if desired. This will allow users to share the most relevant portion of their content.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Advanced editing from camera
item.description:
This aligns the capture experience in camera and editor by enabling a seamless switch to the Clipchamp editor to make videos more appealing and impactful using advanced edit capabilities.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Edge: Auto-discarding Sleeping Tabs
item.description:
Tabs that have been sleeping for a long time will be discarded to save memory. When a user navigates back to a discarded tab, the tab will need to be reloaded. This can be managed through the AutoDiscardSleepingTabsEnabled policy. This policy will be enabled if the SleepingTabsEnabled policy is enabled.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Enhanced Classification Support for Thai language in Exchange Online, Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, and OneDrive
item.description:
In our continued efforts to enhance classification capabilities, we have added a new feature, Word-Breaker, to our existing Thai Language support in Classification. Words in Thai language sentences do not have spaces between them. And for classification purpose, we relied on the right keywords to be added while creating Sensitive Information Type for ensuring accurate match. However, with this feature, spaces will be added automatically in keywords which will ensure higher match accuracy across all cloud locations (Exchange, Teams, One Drive, SharePoint).
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Configurable Keyboard Shortcuts
item.description:
Set your own keyboard shortcuts to match your work preferences. Customize the keyboard shortcut for an action you frequently use by clicking on the ellipsis and selecting Keyboard shortcuts from the menu.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Pause and Resume support for printer scenarios
item.description:
Pause and Resume support for printer scenarios for customers trying to override a DLP soft warning policy tip when submitting a print job. Before this rollout, the user must reinitiate the print job for the intended result. After this rollout, the override will be stored temporarily, and the print job will execute.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: OneDrive: New Folder Anyone Link Permission: View & Upload
item.description:
We're introducing a new 'View and Upload' permission for folder 'Anyone' links in the OneDrive Admin Sharing Settings. This feature allows tenants to restrict folder links to 'Anyone can view' while still enabling the 'Request Files' functionality. It offers tenants more granular control over content access, ensures compliance with internal policies, and helps administrators maintain a higher level of data governance.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - New question types
item.description:
Viva Pulse authors can add new question types, including matrix types, and leverage enhanced logic to drive more targeted survey experiences for respondents.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Additional formatting options in Outlook for iOS and Android
item.description:
In response to feedback from you, our customers, we are adding support for even more formatting options when composing in Outlook for iOS or Android! You will be able to choose font size and color, set a default font, as well as clearing and painting formatting.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Optical character recognition (OCR) support for SharePoint Online and OneDrive for Business
item.description:
Optical character recognition (OCR) support will detect sensitive content in images and subsequently apply data loss prevention (DLP) policies to prevent exfiltration of that sensitive data in SharePoint Online and OneDrive. This release supports key file types like JPG, JPEG, PNG, TIFF, BMP, and PDF (image-only PDF).
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Optical character recognition (OCR) support for endpoint
item.description:
Optical character recognition (OCR) support will detect sensitive content in images and subsequently apply data loss prevention (DLP) policies to prevent exfiltration of that sensitive data on your Windows endpoint devices. This release supports key file types like JPG, JPEG, PNG, TIFF, BMP and PDF (image only PDF).

GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Support for click through rate metric in Amplify reporting
item.description:
This release will enhance Amplify reporting by adding click through rate metric. A new card will show the percentage of unique users who clicked on a link from the publication, providing insights into user engagement with the campaign.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 Apps: Cloud Update
item.description:
The Cloud Update feature will transition to General Availability. Admins can manage monthly updates for Microsoft 365 Apps for Enterprise using our automation services.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365-apps/admin-center/cloud-update
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Support for click through rate metric in page analytics
item.description:
This release will enhance SharePoint page analytics by adding click through rate metric. A new card will show the percentage of unique viewers who clicked on a link from the news post, providing insights into user engagement with the post.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Unified attachment flow on Teams Mobile
item.description:
Introducing a new content picker for Teams Mobile! Attach any type of content, whether files or media, from the paperclip icon in the compose overflow menu. Our unified attach flow makes it easy and intuitive to attach content from any source location.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Reply and forward emails in a PST file in new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to reply and forward emails in a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Group messages as conversation for PST files in new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to group messages as conversation for emails within .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities, #newoutlookforwindows, #pstfilesupport.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Edge: Secure password deployment in the Edge management service
item.description:
The secure password deployment feature in the Edge management service enables admins to deploy encrypted shared passwords to a set of users, allowing them to log into websites seamlessly without ever seeing the actual passwords. This reduces the risk of unauthorized access and enhances the organization's overall security posture.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker recognition and attribution in Teams Rooms on Android
item.description:
You can now take advantage of speaker recognition, transcript attribution, and AI capabilities in Teams Rooms on Android. Intelligent speaker functionalities are brought to existing speakers via the cloud. This feature identifies and attributes people in live transcripts, utilizing a unique voice profile for each participant enabling intelligent recaps and maximum value from Microsoft 365 Copilot and Teams Premium in meetings. Users can easily and securely enroll voices via Teams Settings. This feature requires a Teams Rooms Pro license.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Support for enhanced calendar-sharing architecture in the New Outlook for Windows and Web
item.description:
This update improves the reliability of calendar sharing and ensures that the events seen by delegates are always up to date. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Detailed error description for LMS setup failures
item.description:
LMS setup form will now have detailed error description for LMS setup failures.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview AI Hub – Data Assessments
item.description:
Data assessments in Microsoft Purview AI Hub provides a way for admins to drive data security outcomes by creating scoped assessments, reviewing the data sensitivity and user accesses on locations, and performing remediation actions to mitigate risk.
GA date: April CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

item.title: OneDrive: Sync admin reports - GCC
item.description:
We are adding support for the OneDrive Sync admin reports for the GCC environment.
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Custom account icons in Outlook Mobile
item.description:
Soon, you'll be able to choose a custom icon so that it's easier to tell your accounts apart while using Outlook on iOS and Android.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity label grouping modernization
item.description:
To help improve label usability and configuration, the sensitivity labeling scheme will be simplified to only consist of labels and label groupings. These new label groupings allow admins to better organize and categorize their labels (previously done via parent labels).
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- OCR support in Insider Risk Management
item.description:
With this update, Insider Risk Management will support the scanning technique of Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to detect potentially risky activities that may lead to data security incidents related to images in SharePoint, Teams messages, and endpoints. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

GA date: January CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Set New Ringtones in Teams Mobile
item.description:
This feature allows you to customize and select different sounds for various types of calls, helping you better manage your alerts and distinguish between different incoming communications. For users with Microsoft Teams Phone, this also includes calls for forwarded and delegated calls.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Simplified Input box update in Copilot Chat
item.description:
We are making it easier for users to type prompts with access to CIQ, local files, attach cloud files, and agents by adding it under the Plus Menu.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Call quality reports for BYOD rooms in the Pro Management portal
item.description:
As with Microsoft Teams Rooms, admins can now access detailed call quality reports for BYOD rooms with associated peripherals in the Pro Management portal. These reports include call history and session details that help diagnose network, audio, and video issues. Reports in the Pro Management portal requires a Teams Shared Devices license for the room.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Prompt Gallery - Company-wide prompt publishing
item.description:
Organizations can build their own collections of prompts that are tailored to their business needs and workflows and distribute these to all users within the tenant.
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Prompt Gallery - Share a prompt to a Microsoft Team's team
item.description:
Share custom prompts with members of a Microsoft Teams team from the Copilot Prompt Gallery in Copilot Chat, allowing team members to easily discover and utilize these prompts in Copilot Prompt Gallery.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Outlook: New Outlook Support For GCC-High and Sovereign Clouds
item.description:
New Outlook will support the connection of accounts in special environments such as Microsoft 365 GCC High, Microsoft 365 DoD, and Microsoft 365 operated by 21Vianet (China). In this release, all mailboxes connected to new Outlook will need to be hosted in the same special environment. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: January CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): People Skills is now available
item.description:
We’re excited to launch People Skills, an AI-powered service that delivers personalized skills-based experiences across Microsoft 365. Using advanced inferencing, it helps organizations identify skill gaps and promote upskilling. With People Skills, individuals can easily share a current view of their skills and more easily connect with others. People Skills data enriches people-based experiences in Microsoft 365 Copilot and in the Microsoft 365 profile card and editor.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Chat module UI refresh
item.description:
Copilot Chat is designed to provide a streamlined UI, making it easy to get started and achieve your goals quickly. It offers a helpful, understanding, and personalized experience, allowing you to search for past interactions, content, agents, or pages with ease.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Profile cards in the new Outlook for Windows display people details stored in PST files
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to click on a person to view their details stored in a .pst file on the profile card . Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Profile cards in the new Outlook for Windows display people details stored in PST files
item.description:
With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to click on a person to view their details stored in a .pst file on the profile card . Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms can help monitor response collection and insights
item.description:
Copilot in Forms can now help you monitor and collect responses for your forms, so you can get the data you need with much less effort. Copilot can create a collection plan, track your progress, and let you know when to take action with reminders and insights. Forms can notify you when early insights are ready, and you can easily continue your analysis with Copilot in Excel. Say goodbye to manual follow-ups and hello to smarter collection and analysis.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite – Remote Help supports multi-session AVD
item.description:
Remote Help supports AVD sessions with 1 user on 1 VM today. This feature will enable support for multi-session AVD with several users on 1 VM.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention Always-on diagnostics for Windows endpoints (Phase 1)
item.description:
This feature release ‘Always-on diagnostics’, captures critical diagnostic data from onboarded endpoint devices running on Windows OS for EDLP issue reporting. Comprehensive trace logs will be automatically recorded and stored locally on the devices, eliminating the need to reproduce issues when submitting investigation requests to Microsoft. It allows for the collection of detailed traces over extended periods (up to 90 days). While raising tickets to submit investigation requests to Microsoft regarding Microsoft Endpoint DLP, customers can share enhanced diagnostic information with Microsoft without needing to reproduce the exact scenario.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Sensitivity Labels for Loop Components
item.description:
Sensitivity labels for Loop components - Users can set/apply/view sensitivity labels to loop components to classify and protect content based on its sensitivity level. The labels help enforce policies such as encryption, access control, and content marking to ensure that sensitive information is handled appropriately.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Dashboard in Sites
item.description:
The dashboard layout webpart will be available on all sites and pages. Currently the dashboard webpart is limited to Home Sites, it will be extended to Team Sites and Communication Sites
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Policy sync status on Purview portal
item.description:
The Policy Sync Status feature enables solution admins to know the policy sync status directly from the Policy page in Purview portal. When a policy is created or updated by a user, the changes are distributed to the locations selected. This new feature will give users insight into whether the policy changes have reached the target locations. This policy sync status feature is available for DLP (excluding endpoint policies), Information Protection, Data Loss Management, Records Management, Information Barriers, and Priva.
GA date: May CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Search past sessions in Copilot Chat
item.description:
Search through your past Copilot conversations in Copilot Chat.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Create channels with ease
item.description:
