We are updating this item to reflect that the feature is currently available within the USA, Australia, and the UK, and is still rolling out to all other geolocations.
GA date: November CY2024
Preview date: September CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in policy match as evidence (Microsoft managed storage)
item.description:
With this capability, Admins can choose to store a copy of the file that resulted in a DLP policy match. The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity. To configure Microsoft managed storage, similar to customer managed storage, the user can go to endpoint DLP settings and select Microsoft managed storage. As compared to customer managed storage, the admin need not configure any additional settings like adding a blob, assigning permissions, or selecting storage in policy workflow.
GA date: February CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection: SharePoint Online extends library permissions to downloaded files
item.description:
This new capability ties together SharePoint Online library permissions with Purview sensitivity labeling and protection. SharePoint Online document library owners can set a label on the library, automatically applying that label to all unprotected and unlabeled Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and PDF files in the target library. Files downloaded from these libraries are protected at download. Users accessing these files outside of SharePoint Online have their rights evaluated in real time against the document library. Changes to user permissions on the document library are reflected on downloaded files, including full revocation for users removed from the document library. This provides a more centralized information worker-managed permission model that also offers revocation capabilities at a user level, rather than per-document.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot for leaders in Viva Insights
item.description:
Empower leaders to ask questions about their organization and how their team is doing through responses that leverage Viva Insights behavioral metrics and organizational context data.
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

item.title: SharePoint: Updates for font management capabilities
item.description:
We are introducing updates that provide capabilities for managing custom fonts for SharePoint and Viva Connections. This includes the ability to hide the From Microsoft font packages from Change the look, apply a font package in your site templates, and updated availability for the From Microsoft font packages.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Outlook Mobile - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
item.description:
The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for iOS and Outlook for Android can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: SharePoint: Editorial Card web part in SharePoint Pages and News
item.description:
We are introducing a Web Part called the Editorial Card to enhance page experiences. This card-like container allows for manual creation tailored to your needs, creating eye-catching content to capture viewers’ attentions.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Multiple column layouts in email
item.description:
Viva Amplify authored email will support two column layouts.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Animated GIFs in email
item.description:
We are bringing animated GIFs to email crafted by Viva Amplify. GIFs of limited size will appear as animations in Outlook clients.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for meeting participants to edit their display name
item.description:
Teams meeting participants will be able to edit their display name, enabling more flexibility in their meeting presence, regardless of their tenant set display name. Users can make this change during the meeting and it will persist throughout the duration of the meeting.

GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Data export for Viva Glint and Viva Insights data
item.description:
This feature will allow Viva Insights Analyst to download a CSV file containing Viva Glint survey results joined with Viva Insights organizational data.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Account descriptions
item.description:
New Outlook users can now set custom descriptions for their accounts, making them easier to tell apart in the folder list and various lists and menus across the application. The description can be set in the account settings. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Edge: Edge on MacOS now seamlessly opens links in Teams
item.description:
When you set the default browser to Microsoft Edge on MacOS and enable the feature, web links from the Teams desktop app sent via chats, channels, calendar, and other entry points will seamlessly open automatically in the profile that is signed into Teams app and skips the need to reauthenticate in the browser making it faster and easier to access content. Administrators can control the availability of this feature using the "Choose Which Browser Opens Web Links" Microsoft 365 policy.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Excel: Forms data sync support in Excel desktop
item.description:
Users can get up-to-date form responses data in Excel desktop. Users can also create a new form from Excel desktop with a data sync connection to the Excel workbook.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): UX Transparency for Web Queries
item.description:
With UX transparency of web grounding in Copilot, users will now be able to see the exact queries sent by Copilot in response to a user's prompt to the web for grounding, along with the list of websites being queried, enhancing their awareness over the process.
GA date: November CY2024
Preview date: October CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Calendar grid keyboard navigation via arrow keys in new Outlook for Windows and web
item.description:
When focused on the calendar grid, you will be able to navigate the time slots on the calendar via left/right/up/down arrow keys in day, week, and work week views. #newoutlookforwindows While rolling out this feature, we detected an issue specifically affecting Outlook on the Web in the Safari browser. Because of this, we have opted to roll back the existing progression to temporarily remove support for Safari. We have now restarted the rollout and support for Safari is planned to be added by mid-2025.
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Guided upgrade of applications
item.description:
Enterprise Application Management enables you to easily update previously provisioned EAM applications with a securely hosted enterprise catalog.
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Access: Integrate Monaco framework to improve SQL editor capabilities
item.description:
The Monaco Editor is the fully featured code editor from VS Code with standard IDE functionality such as syntax highlighting, IntelliSense, and autocomplete.
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot takes emails and meetings into account while drafting content in Word
item.description:
You will no longer need to reference certain types of organizational data for Copilot to generate contextually relevant content. People and chats will still need to be referenced explicitly.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Create the perfect banner for your document with Copilot and Designer
item.description:
Chat with Copilot in Word, and let Designer help your document stand out by producing eye-catching visuals that fill the width of the page.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Prompt Gallery - Share a prompt to a Microsoft Teams team
item.description:
Share custom prompts with members of a Microsoft Teams team, allowing team members to easily discover and utilize these prompts in Copilot Prompt Gallery.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Share prompts with others in Business Chat and Copilot Lab
item.description:
Easily share a prompt with others in the form of a link.
GA date: December CY2024
Preview date: September CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts on local files when using Copilot with Graph-grounded chat
item.description:
Ground prompts on local files when using Copilot with Graph-grounded chat by clicking "Upload" in the ContextIQ interface.
GA date: August CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Enhance the Comment Experience for Live Surveys
item.description:
Updating the survey experience to provide ability to display the comment box on the screen when a user is providing a rating. Currently, the survey automatically progresses to the next question after the user selects a rating, without giving them an opportunity to leave a comment. With this change, the program will have the ability for the comment box will be persistently visible, encouraging users to provide more qualitative feedback alongside their rating.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Email Previews for Live Surveys
item.description:
Customers can preview and test email notifications for survey start (available in VG), survey reminder and survey end/results rollout after configuring and approving program settings.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove recommendations in Recommended to You
item.description:
This gives users the ability to remove the recommendations which they do not need in the Recommended to you section.
GA date: March CY2025
Preview date: July CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove learning objects shown in In-progress section
item.description:
Users can remove learning objects shown in the In-progress section.
GA date: March CY2025
Preview date: July CY2024

item.title: OneDrive: Annotate with Apple Pencil Experience on OneDrive for iOS
item.description:
Annotating with hand-drawn content in the OneDrive apps for iOS and iPadOS is now easier than ever. Enjoy various types of annotation tools and expressive strokes that match your pressure.
GA date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - User analytics
item.description:
With this feature, insights will be generated for potentially risky behaviors at a user level and will be surfaced across the following experiences: 1) Insider risk management context in DLP alert investigation 2) Insider risk management context in Communication compliance alert investigation 3) Insider risk management context in Microsoft Defender XDR user entity page 4) Advanced hunting in Microsoft Defender XDR User analytics will cover all eligible users in the tenant including users not in the scope of any Insider risk management policy. Customers can enable/disable user analytics in their tenant from Insider Risk Management settings. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Zero downtime for Viva Glint releases
item.description:
Viva Glint releases previously needed several hours of downtime. With this feature, future releases will be transparent to customers, requiring no downtime planning.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Cross workload predicate support on Mac Endpoints (File size, partially scannable, etc.)
item.description:
With this capability, admins can extend these mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint: document is unscannable, document didn't complete scanning, document size equals or is greater than, document name contains words or phrases, and document is password protected.
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Custom question benchmark mapping
item.description:
Enables survey creators to associate custom questions with Glint standard questions to leverage benchmark comparisons in the reporting UI. This customization ensures that survey creators can tailor Glint standard questions to their specific needs while gaining valuable insights from benchmark data.
GA date: February CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

item.title: SharePoint: Pages authoring accessibility checker
item.description:
SharePoint Accessibility Assistant empowers content creators to ensure their SharePoint Pages meet accessibility standards.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updated Context IQ menu in Business Chat
item.description:
Updates to Copilot Context IQ menu provides an intuitive and seamless interaction improving reliability and performance.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone setting and reactions
item.description:
In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Video creation in Copilot Visual Creator powered by Clipchamp
item.description:
Clipchamp brings video creation skills to Visual Creator in Copilot. Type your prompt and Clipchamp will write a bespoke script, source high quality stock footage, and assemble a video project with music, voiceover, text overlays and transitions. Open your video project draft in Clipchamp app to continue editing, export and share. Great for informational videos, video messaging, how-to, demo and video presentations.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Shifts Graph APIs in beta moved to production (v1.0)
item.description:
We are excited to announce that the Shifts Graph APIs have transitioned from beta to production. This change brings enhanced stability and reliability to the APIs, ensuring a seamless experience for developers and users alike.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Start/stop recording on Teams Rooms on Windows
item.description:
When attending a meeting using a Teams Rooms on Windows device, users can now start or stop recording without having to join on their companion device. The start/stop recording button will be available on the Teams Rooms on Windows device for all in-tenant meetings. This feature requires the Teams Rooms Pro license.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - EXPORT ENHANCEMENTS
item.description:
With the export of data being one of the core fundamentals of the solution, Microsoft Purview eDiscovery team is excited to announce significant changes coming to the export feature along with the new user experience in purview.microsoft.com. Key changes with export enhancements: The biggest change being introduced is that with the new user experience for eDiscovery where Standard and Premium cases have unified structure, the export is also aligned for both the streams – thereby providing a singular experience to customers. The behavior is now unified across all export jobs - same download experience, some report experience, same error messages. For Standard customers, the need to install a clickonce application in their machine and use that tool to download data for exporting in azure storage is history. Now, in the new experience, customers don’t need to install the app anymore and can download directly through browser. Additionally, customers will experience a faster export capability in the new portal driven through enhancements in backend architecture and optimized partition.
GA date: February CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Schedule from email with Copilot
item.description:
Often you may want to transition a conversation from an email thread to a meeting. Copilot helps you do this by being able to start scheduling right from the email conversation. It saves you time and effort by generating a meeting invite that's ready for you to review and send. When you click on "Schedule with Copilot" a meeting form will appear with a Copilot generated meeting title, agenda, and conversation summary as well as a pre-filled attendee list from the email thread and an attachment of the original email thread. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows, web, Mac, and mobile. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Share user risk details with other security solutions [Government customers only]
item.description:
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management is introducing sharing Insider Risk Management data with other Microsoft services for Government customers. When turned on, admins with the correct permissions will be able to review user risk details and alerts from Insider Risk Management within other solutions such as Data Loss Prevention (DLP), Communication Compliance, and Microsoft Defender. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Approvals in Teams within GCCH
item.description:
Users within GCCH will now be able to use the Approvals app within Microsoft Teams.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Ideas Workspace Functions as a Shared Loop workspace
item.description:
Loop Ideas workspaces are tenant-managed like SharePoint Communication sites. They appear with existing Loop workspaces, with all features such as adding members and organizing pages
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – New personal Loop workspace
item.description:
The Loop app now provides a personal workspace to all users, which is shared with Copilot Pages. This personal workspace is a user-owned SharePoint Embedded container, one per user. All governance, lifecycle management and compliance processes apply the same way they would to a user's OneDrive.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Ability to request delegate access in Viva Insights
item.description:
Viva Insights users will now be able request delegate access from a Manager in the Insights Teams or Web app. Previously, Managers could assign delegates, but potential delegates could not request access from a Manager. This request access update will allow for increased ease & flexibility of providing delegate access in Insights.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Approvals in Teams within DoD
item.description:
Users within DoD will now be able to use the Approvals app within Microsoft Teams.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Ability to increase configuration of CPU and GPU device resource utilization limits in Forensic Evidence
item.description:
Insider Risk Management Administrators will now be able to increase the CPU and GPU device resource utilization limit for all devices uploading Forensic Evidence clips in their organization. Forensic Evidence will now allow up to 31% CPU and GPU device resource utilization, up from the prior maximum limit of 5%. This enhancement reduces interruptions in the recording and uploading of clips. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: February CY2025
Preview date: October CY2024

item.title: Whiteboard: Microsoft Forms Poll Loop component live copy/paste
item.description:
The ability to copy/paste existing Microsoft Forms Poll Loop components into Whiteboard and vice versa.
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Immersive Content Consumption Update
item.description:
Current Learning Content details and Player page will be combined to give a more immersive consumption experience for users in Viva Learning. The update will impact all content details pages.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Dynamic watermarking for files protected with sensitivity labels
item.description:
Dynamic watermarking is a new sensitivity label setting that overlays watermark text containing the consuming user’s information on content in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. This setting is supported for labels with admin-defined protection.
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: July CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - AI & Copilot Resources provider
item.description:
The AI & Copilot Resources provider will power the OOB Microsoft Copilot Academy and will be visible by default to users who have Copilot licenses. Admins will be able to enable, disable, and apply permissions on the content of this provider.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Windows 365: Available from New Zealand North
item.description:
Windows 365 will be available in New Zealand North.
GA date: June CY2025

item.title: Bookings: ''Cc" functionality to email notifications
item.description:
"CC" additional email addresses on confirmation & reminder emails for 1:1 & N:1 appointments.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Configure External access policies in TAC
item.description:
External access policies can be managed in Teams admin center. These policies were previously only supported in PowerShell, and we are bringing the same capabilities into the Teams admin center user experience.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel - Summarize text columns
item.description:
Copilot can analyze columns of text to give you summaries of the information. For example, Copilot will find the main themes in survey responses from open-ended questions.
GA date: August CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel support for formula data summaries in rows and cells
item.description:
Add a single formula to summarize column data into one cell. Today, full column calculations produce a unique result in each row, but this new feature gives you the option to calculate all data in a column together to return one result. You can also create a row with formulas that apply for relevant columns; for example, an "add total sales row" will add a SUM formula underneath every column that has sales data.
GA date: August CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Support for Exchange On-Premises Servers
item.description:
Outlook for Mac will support accounts for Microsoft Exchange on-premises servers.

GA date: July CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Delayed simultaneous ring setting
item.description:
For teams with shared call responsibilities, delayed simultaneous ring will ensure calls configure the intended recipient first, instead of notifying everyone the moment a call comes in. This helps reduce noise and minimizes distractions —especially for roles like delegates and customer service teams.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Edge: v.133 - Extending support for viewing MIP Protected PDF Files to different sovereignties (including GCCH)
item.description:
Sovereign cloud customers (including GCCH) will be able to open MIP protected PDF content in Microsoft Edge. This change will be available in the Microsoft Edge built-in PDF reader powered by Adobe Acrobat and the legacy Microsoft Edge PDF engine.
GA date: February CY2025
Preview date: April CY2024

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft 365 Copilot for GCC Moderate
item.description:
We will be introducing a new Usage report covering Microsoft 365 Copilot. This report will include total enabled and active users, Copilot usage with a breakout per Microsoft 365 app, and user-level activity insights (anonymized by default).
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Audience breakdown tooltip
item.description:
Amplify reports will provide a breakdown of the channels shown in the Unique viewers card. The tool tip will show the top 5 channel audiences and their contribution to the overall numbers for each publication channel presented in the report.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Forward messages with app cards
item.description:
Messages containing app cards in chats and channels can now be forwarded. To use, navigate to the more actions menu of any message containing an app card, and select "Forward".
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Loop workspace sensitivity labels
item.description:
Users can apply container-level sensitivity labels to Loop workspaces to prevent oversharing and manage access effectively.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Excel – Formula Conditional Formatting
item.description:
Additional support for complex conditional formats beyond the basic top and bottom or conditional operators. For example, Copilot analyzes two factors when highlighting all rows where the product is bikes and sales is greater than 100.
GA date: July CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Search relevance improvements
item.description:
Social signals like ratings and views are included in Search relevancy and users can now search for author and provider.
GA date: July CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Introducing the New Republish Feature in Viva Amplify
item.description:
We’re excited to launch Republish, a new feature that keeps your content fresh, extends its reach, and maximizes engagement across SharePoint, Viva Engage, Outlook, and Teams. Update existing published content in a few clicks, re-share key messages to new audiences or channels, correct errors and refine your messaging —all without starting from scratch. Republish in Viva Amplify makes content management effortless.
GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Teams meetings for GCC
item.description:
Copilot helps you run more effective meetings, get up to speed on the conversation, organize key discussion points, and summarize key actions so it’s clear what you need to do next. Users can type any question or use predetermined prompts during or after the meeting, and their interactions with Copilot are only visible to them. This feature is already available in worldwide multitenant and will now be available for customers in GCC.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva - Copilot dashboard Exclusion List through Entra(AAD) groups
item.description:
For the Copilot dashboard, the exclusion list can be managed by Global Administrators using AAD (Azure Active Directory) Groups.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Categorize single items in conversation view in new Outlook for Windows and Web
item.description:
This functionality will allow users to categorize individual emails within the conversation view, enhancing organization and tracking. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Spell check in Viva Learning search
item.description:
User queries will be spell checked and corrected for all in-app Search. 2/12/2025: This roadmap item was changed inadvertently to Launched. The correct status is Rolling out. We apologize for any inconvenience.
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: January CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Easily start a new email from document previewer in the Outlook app for Android
item.description:
From the document previewer, there will now be an option to start a new mail with the document being viewed added to that new email
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot agents in Teams group chats
item.description:
Now users can discover and add Copilot agents to group chats in Teams to extend Microsoft Copilot to their flow of work.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Planner: New Microsoft Planner app for the web
item.description:
We apologize for any inconvenience; this roadmap item should have included GCC as was communicated in the associated Message center post. The new Microsoft Planner app for the web is a single, unified work management experience. Assisted by AI, it brings together the simplicity of Microsoft To Do, the collaboration of Planner, and the power of Microsoft Project into a simple, scalable, intelligent solution that spans from individual task management to enterprise and professional project management.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - New Business Chat prompts submitted through Teams
item.description:
This adds new Business Chat prompts submitted through Teams metric to Copilot dashboard and Viva Insights Advanced insights.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections News Notifications in Gov Clouds
item.description:
With this release, existing news notifications in Viva Connections will now be available in GCC, GCCH and DoD. News notifications are delivered via Microsoft Teams in the desktop, mobile, and web environments in the following scenarios: News is published to a SharePoint team or communication site a user follows or by someone a user works closely with. News is boosted. Someone comments on a new News post. Someone "Likes" a News post. Someone is @mentioned in a comment on a news post.
GA date: August CY2024

item.title: OneDrive: View PDFs with Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels on OneDrive Mobile
item.description:
With this capability, OneDrive users can open PDF files that are protected with Microsoft Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels and read them using OneDrive mobile apps in read-only mode. Only authorized users will be able to access these PDF files.
GA date: September CY2024
Preview date: August CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Message Recall
item.description:
Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature will be coming to Outlook for Mac.
GA date: February CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: AIR Initiated Remediation Logging
item.description:
The AIR attribution update will empower customers with enhanced insights by deciphering between remediations produced by AIR versus truly manual remediations initiated independently by SecOps teams. Presently, all actions produced by AIR and approved by SecOps are logged as manual remediations throughout the portal. With this update, messages that are remediated as a result of approval of an AIR action will be logged as SecOps approved automated actions.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365: Long-term retention period for M365 Backup
item.description:
This creates the ability to set longer term retention periods to restore beyond one year.
GA date: August CY2026
Preview date: March CY2026

item.title: Whiteboard: Sticky notes accelerator
item.description:
Sticky note accelerators will help users work faster in Whiteboard by simplifying adding sticky notes. With a single click, users can quickly add sticky notes, making brainstorming and collaboration seamless.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Microsoft 365 Archive file-level archiving
item.description:
This introduces archiving at the file level for Microsoft 365 Archive.
GA date: July CY2026
Preview date: January CY2026

item.title: Outlook: First phase of PST support in new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
The first phase PST (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) support in the new Outlook for Windows provides read-only access to Mail items within *.pst files. Users will be able to open *.pst files, read their emails within *.pst files, and search *.pst files for emails. All Calendar, Contacts, and Tasks data saved in the *.pst files are still there, but they cannot be accessed in this preview. Next releases will expand PST support capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows, #pstfilesupport
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Copy a publication within a campaign
item.description:
Gone are the days where you must rewrite or manually copy and paste content from an old publication to a newly drafted one to reuse it. Soon in Viva Amplify, you will be able to copy a publication within an existing campaign with just a few clicks. This new feature streamlines the content creation process, enabling communicators to easily reuse existing content across SharePoint, Outlook, and Teams, including all channel-specific customizations and related audiences, saving you time and effort.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Multi-language posts
item.description:
Authors of Viva Engage posts will be able to add multiple manually written translations to a single post.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning – Multilayer structuring, customization, and branding for learning academies
item.description:
This feature set brings new functionality to learning academies. Multi-layer structuring allows users to organize content and learning paths under multiple levels. Branding capabilities include the customization of the academy logo and the background image. Customization allows users to hide or show individual components of an academy like featured sets and learner profile cards.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to duplicate Microsoft Copilot Academy
item.description:
Admins will be able to duplicate Copilot Academy and customize it for their own requirements. They will also be able to duplicate Microsoft curated Learning paths and featured Set.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning – Edit Learning Paths in Viva Learning
item.description:
Admin will be able to edit learning paths metadata and content. Latest updates will be shown to learner after the LP is edited.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Use the Egress API to provide learner access to “My Learning” records
item.description:
The Egress API can be used by learners to view their My Learning records and corresponding course details.
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Auto-labeling policies support Fingerprinting SITs
item.description:
Admins can now automatically label files and emails with Fingerprinting SITs via auto-labeling policies.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: 3x3 video gallery on dual displays for Teams Rooms on Android
item.description:
Dual display rooms are now capable of presenting up to 18 videos (3x3 on each screen) when no content is being shared during meetings. This enhancement ensures a uniform experience across both Windows and Android Teams Rooms devices.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams now available for multitenant organizations
item.description:
Copilot is available to users in a multitenant organization, provided the user has an active Copilot license in their host tenant.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Video clip in channel
item.description:
You can now use Teams video clip in channel, in addition to chat. Record yourself, your screen, or an audio-only clip and attach the video clip to your channel post or reply.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Best practice configuration monitoring dashboard in Teams admin center
item.description:
Microsoft recommends best practices to ensure a smooth collaborative experience on Teams. Best Practices dashboard in Teams admin center allows administrators to monitor and promptly address any non-conformance across their organization.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Admin ability to assign Delegates
item.description:
Admins (Global administrators or Insights administrators) will now be able to assign or remove delegates for a Manager in Viva Insights via PowerShell. Previously, only Managers could assign delegates. Now, this ability provides delegate access in Insights to admins, allowing for ease and flexibility.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Forms: New data sync solution replaces old data sync solution for syncing forms responses to Excel
item.description:
Forms is introducing a new data sync solution with higher reliability to sync forms responses data to Excel. The older version of live data sync will be replaced by the newer solution.
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Planner: Board view in My Tasks
item.description:
Board view in My Tasks offers a visual representation of your tasks similar to a kanban board, making it easier to track progress and manage your workload. See all your tasks at a glance and move them between columns to update their progress. You can group tasks by Plan, Progress, Due Date, and Priority, allowing you to tailor the board to your specific needs. Board view is available in addition to the existing grid view in My Tasks.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Exchange: Adding support for Inbound SMTP DANE with DNSSEC for Exchange Online GCC-H and DoD
item.description:
We are adding inbound support for SMTP DANE with DNSSEC to Exchange Online GCC-H and DoD. Look for another roadmap item for inbound support in WW and GCC, and one for outbound support of SMTP DANE with DNSSEC.
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: October CY2025

item.title: Universal Print: Integration with macOS
item.description:
The native integration of Universal Print with macOS will empower macOS users to print from any app, just like Windows users can today. Whether people are on Windows or macOS, they have a seamless, no learning curve print-experience. Organizations benefit from the simplicity of a single print-solution for all users.

GA date: December CY2024
Preview date: January CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Decoupling of Policy tips and Email notifications while configuring rules on Data Loss Prevention for Sharepoint and Onedrive
item.description:
As of today, whenever the user wants to enable email notifications the policy tips also need to be enabled and vice versa, but with this decoupling the admin can configure the following: 1) None of policy tips or email notification 2) Only policy tips 3) Only Email Notifications 4) Both Email Notifications and Policy tips
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - General availability of Microsoft partner data connectors for T-Mobile and HKCSL
item.description:
These connectors will support ingestion for T-Mobile and HKCSL data to user mailboxes and makes them available for compliance.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent recap support for ad-hoc meetings and calls
item.description:
Intelligent recap is available for ad-hoc meetings and calls, like those started from ‘Meet now’ and started from chat. Now, Teams Premium and Copilot for Microsoft 365 licensed users can easily browse the recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions after the ad-hoc meeting ends.
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Sort and Filter improvements on Outlook on the Web and New Outlook for Windows
item.description:
Sort and Filter will now be separate buttons in the Message List. This will make it easier to change the Sorted by and the Filtered by values separately. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: August CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Swipe in the Message List on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
item.description:
The Message List will now support Swipe from Left and Swipe from Right actions on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows. As a result, some minor organization changes will also happen for the hover actions. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: August CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Forms: Migrate Google Forms through the M365 Admin Center
item.description:
Support Google Forms to Microsoft Forms migration via M365 admin center. Note: The current release phase has been updated to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
GA date: September CY2023

item.title: Outlook: Local Contact Search
item.description:
With a newly added search bar, you may now search your local contact list in Outlook mobile by typing the name of a contact.

GA date: October CY2023
Preview date: September CY2023

item.title: Microsoft Teams: App centric management in Teams Admin Center to manage the Apps access for tenants, end-users, and groups
item.description:
App centric management introduces new admin settings to control who in the tenant can install Teams apps. First, admins can set a default value for new apps that are published to Teams app store. Second, admins can edit the availability of an app to 'All users can install', 'Specific users and groups can install', or 'No user can install'. This feature evolves the existing app permission policies and provides admins with the ability to manage access to the app individually. The app permission policies for existing customers are migrated to maintain existing app availability in the tenant.

GA date: November CY2023

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Integrated Apps in M365 admin center for managing apps across M365 suite products
item.description:
Introducing Integrated Apps in M365 admin center to allow admins to discover, deploy and manage apps across various M365 suite products.

GA date: December CY2023

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Using Topics in Viva Engage will grant limited access to Viva Topic Names
item.description:
As part of the Viva Engage (Yammer) transition to the Viva Topics platform, Viva Engage posts (conversations, questions, polls, announcements, storyline posts) will be considered as Viva Topic resources. As a result, topic names will be applied to posts and will grant limited access to the topic for all users with access to the post.
GA date: September CY2023

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Empower end users to report inappropriate posts and comments in Viva Engage
item.description:
Microsoft Viva Engage users are empowered to report inappropriate or concerning posts and comments within Viva Engage conversations. These reported posts are then submitted to a Communication Compliance policy for designated investigators with the appropriate role-based access control permissions to review and take action if deemed necessary. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We have updated the release phase to the reflect current state. Additionally, this began rolling out to GA in December 2023 and did not release to Preview. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
GA date: December CY2023

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Apply protection at the time of egress on endpoints (U.S. Government clouds)
item.description:
Extend protection to unclassified files on Windows endpoint by applying restrictions defined in DLP policies at the time of egress.

GA date: November CY2023

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Apply Purview Message Encryption branding with DLP policy
item.description:
Purview Messaging Encryption supports customized branding templates for encrypted mail sent to external recipients. The functionality is being brought to Data Loss Prevention from Exchange mail flow rule. In addition, DLP policies provide additional configuration to control whether Microsoft 365 external recipients will be able to view the encrypted mail inline using Outlook or the encrypted portal experience.

GA date: August CY2023

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Export Viva Goals OKR view to PowerPoint
item.description:
New feature allows users export a list and create a slide for each OKR in PowerPoint

GA date: September CY2023

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit (Premium) – Customized retention policies for 10-Year Audit Log Retention Add On
item.description:
This feature will enable customers with the 10-Year Audit Log Retention Add On for Microsoft Purview Audit (Premium) to create additional customized retention policies. The new options are 7 days, 30 days, 3 years, 5 years, and 7 years retention.

GA date: June CY2023
Preview date: April CY2023

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Customize the location of Teams notifications
item.description:
You can now customize where your Teams notification appear on your screen. Options include bottom right, top right, bottom left, and top left, allowing you to choose the most convenient and least intrusive location for a better experience and productivity.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Brand Impersonation Protection for Teams Messaging
item.description:
Identify if an external user is impersonating a brand commonly targeted by phishing attacks, during their initial contact with an enterprise user via Teams messages.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Schedule messages in channels
item.description:
Like in chat, you can now schedule send messages in channels. You can optimize the timing of your messages based on the recipient's work hours, out-of-office time, etc, and ensuring your messages are delivered at the most suitable time.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Support for Document Property Predicate on Endpoint DLP
item.description:
With this capability, admins can extend the condition 'Document Property is' to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Support for Four New predicates on Endpoint DLP
item.description:
With this capability, admins can extend the below mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint - Document is unscannable - Document didn't complete scanning - Document name matches patterns - Document size equals or is greater than
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot for PowerPoint will help you build your story's narrative
item.description:
Steer your narrative with Copilot when creating a PowerPoint presentation.
GA date: August CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Loop available in Loop components in Teams and Outlook
item.description:
People with a Copilot License can now leverage Copilot in Loop when they paste Loop components into the Teams app, Outlook, and Meeting Notes.
GA date: May CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel - Custom chart and PivotTable creation
item.description:
You can now ask for more specific charts and PivotTables, including specifying the x and y axis of charts.
GA date: August CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance- Enrich triage in Communication compliance with Insider Risk context
item.description:
Enhance the triage experience in communication compliance with Insider Risk Insights. This integration provides investigators a deeper understanding of the risk profile of message senders along with a more comprehensive view of the sender's risk severity and historical risk-related actions. With this enriched context, investigators are empowered to make more informed and effective remediation decisions, ensuring a robust compliance posture.
GA date: December CY2024
Preview date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Loop: Copilot-assisted Loop Page Creation
item.description:
Collaborate with Copilot to go from a blank page to a structured document ready for collaboration as quickly as possible. Start from scratch or select an existing page or template as the starting point and Copilot can modify it for the task at hand.
GA date: July CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage – pin post to leadership corner
item.description:
Admins and corporate communicators will be able to pin one post that will show at the top of everyone's leadership corner
GA date: June CY2024

item.title: Planner: Baseline with Task level variance
item.description:
Capture a Baseline of your plan and view plan and task-level variances to know if the plan is on track or delayed.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: SharePoint: Change history reports
item.description:
Create custom reports to monitor changes made to the SharePoint configuration across various levels of your organization. Review CSV reports of site actions or organization setting changes made within the last 180 days.
GA date: August CY2024
Preview date: April CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms aids students with step-by-step solutions for quiz questions
item.description:
With Copilot in Forms quizzes, teachers can easily generate step-by-step solutions for each question. Teachers have the option to allow students to immediately view their results so they can see what they've mastered and where they need further studying using the step-by-step solutions supported by Copilot.
GA date: August CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Admin Units support in Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection
item.description:
With this capability organizations will be able to delegate management and remediation authority for different people in different regions or organization units with role-based access control (RBAC) via Azure Active Directory Administrative Units.  Eg – German investigators should be able to investigate alerts and audit events for only German users.

GA date: October CY2023

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Support for inline videos and GIFs in articles
item.description:
This adds support for inline videos and GIFs in Viva Engage articles.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Copilot Chat developer mode
item.description:
Developers can use Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat and enable developer mode to debug.
GA date: March CY2025
Preview date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Block a user for your organization
item.description:
With the availability of the delete API (removeallaccessforuser API), it does not stop the malicious user from resending the message to the same victim. To help prevent that, a block user API will allow the admin to block the malicious user from reaching out again. To make this even more effective, we will utilize a similar feature as the allow/block list in federation to block the malicious user from the entire organization.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Information Protection: Protect your most sensitive content with double key encryption
item.description:
Double Key Encryption (DKE) provides organizations with a second encryption key for your most sensitive content.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/double-key-encryption
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Keyword monitoring email notification enhancements
item.description:
This revamps the existing content alert (keyword monitoring) emails that admins receive to include added context on the content being monitored and minor security enhancements.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
item.description:
This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

item.title: Planner: Add premium capabilities to Planner
item.description:
Add premium capabilities like sprint planning, people view, goals, custom fields, and task history to your plans within the Planner Teams app.
GA date: June CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps: Behaviors
item.description:
A new data type in Microsoft 365 Defender Advanced Hunting. Behaviors will optimize the alerts queue by enabling security teams to focus on the most relevant alerts in their environment. They will indicate what took place in a descriptive form, attached to the MITRE tactics and techniques that are common measure most organizations follow and test their coverage against. This new data type which sits between the raw data and alert, will enable your security teams to prioritize critical alerts in your environment without having to compromise contextual information provided in a behavior that may be important to an investigation. The behaviors data will also enrich the context of related incidents and only correlate anomalies when relevant. Within Defender for Cloud Apps, we have identified some detections that are better suited as behaviors, and we are transforming them to the new data type to reflect it that can be retrieved via advanced hunting.
GA date: May CY2024
Preview date: May CY2023

item.title: OneDrive: Upcoming change to shared folder experience in Microsoft OneDrive
item.description:
With this feature update, when a user clicks a link to a shared folder from Teams chat, channels, email, or other places, they will navigate to the shared folder within the People view of their own OneDrive. This new view, organized by people, will show and allow access to all the files and folders that have been shared with the user.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Developers building agents in Azure AI Foundry can ground their agent in files stored in SharePoint
item.description:
Tenant Graph grounding provides grounding for agents with relevant information from Microsoft Graph, including files stored in SharePoint. This capability is now available to developers building agents in Azure AI Foundry.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025

item.title: OneNote: Copilot on OneNote brings in notes from Video and Images (iPhone)
item.description:
With this new feature in OneNote mobile, you can share videos and images into OneNote and watch the magic unfold. All the key insights from the video and images are captured effortlessly into notes so that you do not have to manually create them.
GA date: June CY2026
Preview date: June CY2026

item.title: OneNote: Copilot on OneNote brings in notes from Video and Images (Android)
item.description:
With this new feature in OneNote mobile, you can share videos and images into OneNote and watch the magic unfold. All the key insights from the video and images are captured effortlessly into notes so that you do not have to manually create them.
GA date: June CY2026
Preview date: June CY2026

item.title: OneNote: Boost productivity using voice with Copilot on OneNote Mobile (Android)
item.description:
Copilot in OneNote transforms fragmented voice thoughts and conversation recordings into clear, actionable insights. It enhances productivity by accurately capturing and organizing verbal notes, filling in gaps, and providing structured summaries, making it easier to review and utilize information effectively. Exciting News! Copilot in OneNote can now access and understand verbal notes, synthesize conversations, and transform fragmented thoughts into clear, actionable insights, boosting productivity.
GA date: June CY2026
Preview date: June CY2026

item.title: OneNote: Boost productivity using voice with Copilot on OneNote Mobile (iPhone)
item.description:
Copilot in OneNote transforms fragmented voice thoughts and conversation recordings into clear, actionable insights. It enhances productivity by accurately capturing and organizing verbal notes, filling in gaps, and providing structured summaries, making it easier to review and utilize information effectively. Exciting News! Copilot in OneNote can now access and understand verbal notes, synthesize conversations, and transform fragmented thoughts into clear, actionable insights, boosting productivity.
GA date: June CY2026
Preview date: June CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Prompt Gallery - Share a prompt with a co-worker
item.description:
Easily create, save, and share your favorite prompts using Copilot Prompt Gallery, inspiring your co-workers to achieve more with Copilot.
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Search Meeting Attendees
item.description:
Allow user to search meeting attendees by name in the tracking list. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Optical character recognition (OCR) support for embedded images in Exchange Online
item.description:
This release will extend OCR support in Exchange online from standalone images (JPEG, JPG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, PDF) to images embedded inside following files: 1. Office: Images embedded inside XLSX, DOCX, PPTX files. 2. PDF: Image-only PDF files are already supported. This release will support hybrid PDF files containing images and searchable text. 3. Container files such as ZIP, RAR, 7Z, BZ and more.
GA date: February CY2025
Preview date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Data control to enable recycling or reuse of Employee IDs
item.description:
By implementing a control for processing Employee IDs, we enable our customers to efficiently recycle or reuse Employee IDs, particularly in scenarios involving rehiring.
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Data control to process survey data upon receiving a delete signal
item.description:
Empower the customer to control survey data processing upon receiving a DSR request (Data Subject Rights) or Entra ID delete signal, ensuring compliance with data retention policies.
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Outlook: RSVP improvements in event context menu in new Outlook for Windows and web
item.description:
Changes to the event's right-click context menu will make it easier to respond to meeting invitations from the Calendar surface. All RSVP options will be on the first level of the menu. There will be also separate options to respond to either all events in the series or just the current instance. This update will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newOutlookforWindows
GA date: June CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Upload custom PowerPoint templates
item.description:
Enhance your exported presentations with the ability to upload custom PowerPoint templates, ensuring consistent branding in every export.
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - SharePoint results integration in Viva Learning Search
item.description:
Users will be able to discover relevant internal SharePoint content seamlessly while searching within Viva Learning, ensuring they have access to all pertinent resources in one place.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy reports in Viva Insights
item.description:
Usage reporting for Copilot Academy will be available in Viva Insights via the Analyst Workbench. Users can access these reports through Excel or a PowerBI dashboard.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker recognition and attribution available in additional meeting spaces
item.description:
You can now take advantage of speaker recognition and transcript attribution, and AI capabilities in additional meeting spaces, from those equipped with a Teams Room to those relying on a user's PC in a bring you own device (BYOD) room. This feature identifies and attributes people in live transcripts, utilizing a unique voice profile for each participant enabling intelligent recaps and maximum value from Microsoft 365 Copilot in Teams meetings. Users can easily and securely enroll voices via Teams Settings. A Teams Premium license is required on the host desktop in a BYOD room.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Forward messages to and from channels
item.description:
You can now forward messages between channels, allowing you to efficiently share important information with relevant team members. To forward a channel message post, channel post reply, or chat message to another channel, 1:1 or group chat, select the message’s ellipsis menu and choose Forward.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Audio support for screen sharing in immersive events
item.description:
We're adding audio support for screen sharing in Microsoft Mesh. Presenters will now be able to choose whether they'd like to include system audio when starting a screen share in a Mesh event. This feature is available for presenters in Mesh with a Teams Premium license.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Sharepoint: Sharepoint Agents
item.description:
SharePoint users can create an agent in SharePoint simply by selecting the SharePoint sites and/or files. Share these agents with your team to use in SharePoint and/or Teams.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Admins enabled to make bulk employee ID updates
item.description:
This feature will enable Viva Glint service admins to make bulk employee ID updates in the web app.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Calendar notifications in Teams
item.description:
Users can now triage the calendar notifications in their Activity Feed and will get notifications for meeting invites, updates, cancellations, and forwards (if the user is the meeting organizer). These notifications will show up as unread in the Activity Feed pane and will display the details when a user clicks on it.
GA date: March CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva-Glint - Self service for custom access data user export
item.description:
This feature allows Glint admins to export the access rules defined for survey programs, administration, and focus areas that has been customized for users in the platform.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Edit questions associated to live surveys
item.description:
Allow Glint Admins to edit select fields of a question that is associated to live surveys.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Support multitenancy organization via cross tenant sync
item.description:
Enables one instance of Viva Glint to be used by employees in multiple M365 tenants
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint 360s
item.description:
Empower employees to collect 360 feedback for personal growth and development.
GA date: August CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Inline preview of files shared
item.description:
Now you can review a file shared in chat and channels in your flow of work. Select ‘preview’ and scroll through the file’s content without leaving the chat or channel.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Support S/MIME in the new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
New Outlook for Windows will support S/MIME (Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail extensions) signing and encryption. All new and existing S/MIME configurations will work without any explicit action from admins. The feature was already available for Web and now we are extending its availability to New Outlook. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: October CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Support for AppleScript in the New Outlook for Mac
item.description:
AppleScript is a language used to automate the actions of the MacOS and many of its applications. We will add support for this feature in the new Outlook for Mac.

GA date: December CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatically set workplace presence to the building level in Teams
item.description:
When you connect to peripherals in a bring your own device (BYOD) room or at a bookable desk, your workplace presence in Teams will automatically be set to the building level (if you and your admin have given permission), simplifying coordination with others and enabling AI-assisted booking in the future.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Updated Hyperlink Insertion
item.description:
You can now insert a hyperlink in your chat message text in fewer clicks. Select the text you want to display and paste the URL, without needing to use the traditional hyperlink dialog box.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Import HRIS data in Viva Glint from Microsoft Admin Center
item.description:
Customers will be able to use various connectors to HRIS tools to import HRIS data into Viva Glint from Microsoft Admin Center.
GA date: January CY2026

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity label grouping modernization
item.description:
To help improve label usability and configuration, the sensitivity labeling scheme will be simplified to only consist of labels and label groupings. These new label groupings allow admins to better organize and categorize their labels (previously done via parent labels).
GA date: August CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Advanced moderation access control for corporate communicators
item.description:
Network admins can choose to enable advanced moderation access for corporate communicators to manage AI themes + keywords detected within organization.
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Multiple camera view for Teams Room on Windows
item.description:
Teams Room on Windows will support up to four single stream cameras that will be shown to remote meeting attendees. With multiple camera view, remote meeting attendees will have the ability to follow all the action in the room and manually toggle between views from the room that they want to see.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite - Security Baselines for HoloLens 2
item.description:
These security baselines represent Microsoft’s best practice guidelines and experience from deploying and supporting HoloLens 2 devices to customers across various industries.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Charts, Graphs and Data Analysis in Copilot for Microsoft 365
item.description:
Use prompts to create charts, graphs, and data analysis in Business Chat.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Users can opt-in to try the new calendar in Teams
item.description:
The new calendar in Teams combines rich productivity features and the latest innovations, like Microsoft Copilot and Microsoft Places, to help users collaborate seamlessly from anywhere. The new calendar in Teams is designed to be familiar and reliable, as it’s one unified calendar that works across new Outlook for Windows, Outlook on the web, Microsoft Places, and now Microsoft Teams. With this update, users will see the "New calendar" toggle at the top right of the calendar app in Teams. New calendar is off by default, and users can toggle to try the new experience.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Top questions
item.description:
Top Questions shows community members the most-viewed questions in their community over the last 90 days. It is designed to help people quickly find the most relevant and popular questions in their communities.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance- Customize communication compliance policies with language-specific trainable classifier conditions
item.description:
Tailor your policy conditions to run Trainable Classifiers for specific languages. By restricting the languages for classifiers, you can reduce false positives and bring precision to your policy conditions. Update your existing policies with ease for a more language-specific compliance approach.
GA date: February CY2026
Preview date: November CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom name for Teams panels
item.description:
Admins can use the Teams Rooms Pro Management portal to assign a custom name to their Teams Rooms Pro or Teams Shared Device licensed panels. This new name displays on the panel's home screen, replacing the global address book name that appears in Outlook or Teams.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot for Advanced Insights App
item.description:
Copilot in Viva Insights simplifies the query-building process for analysts by suggesting metrics, filters, and attributes that are relevant to the analysis.
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Planner: Unified Planner tab experience in Microsoft Teams
item.description:
With this unified tab experience, you can now create and add any basic or premium plan to a Planner tab in Microsoft Teams. To try it, go to any Teams channel and search for Planner after selecting the Apps icon.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Workplace check-in with Workplace Presence
item.description:
With Workplace Presence, employees will have the ability to check in to the office in Outlook, Teams, and Places to confirm their work plans, receive check-in reminders, and view others nearby and who planned to come in. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - New ChatGPT Enterprise connector to discover and bring prompts and responses into the scope of Purview features
item.description:
Using the unified Purview portal, organizations will be able to establish a connection to their ChatGPT Enterprise workspaces to discover, collect, and store contents of interactions of users with ChatGPT Enterprise into the scope of Purview capabilities and policies.
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Presence is back to Outlook on the Web
item.description:
Teams Presence will be shown in Compose and read scenarios for recipients, co-recipients, and sender. The bubble indicators will provide contact's status and help you decide the best way to communicate with them.

GA date: April CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Estimating the Cost of Optical Character Recognition (OCR) for Exchange Online, Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, OneDrive and EndPoint
item.description:
With OCR cost estimator, without incurring any bill and without providing azure subscription, admins will be able to estimate how much they will pay once they turn “ON” the OCR configuration for the selected locations and scope.

GA date: December CY2024
Preview date: August CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Embedded Knowledge capability support for declarative agents.
item.description:
Developers and makers can embed knowledge (pdf, doc/docx, ppt) into their declarative agents built with Teams Toolkit for additional grounding capabilities.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Ability to use the Graph connector selector when using Teams Toolkit
item.description:
Developers using Teams Toolkit to author declarative agents can select specific Graph connectors to improve their knowledge grounding.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Community replies and reactions in Teams
item.description:
Users with the Viva Engage app in Teams will now receive notifications when others reply or react to their posts.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Community Analytics
item.description:
Updates to community analytics will allow community admins to better understand engagement trends, reach and the top conversations that occur within their communities.
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to take control during screensharing on Web
item.description:
This update enables meeting participants using the Microsoft Teams web app to use the "Take control" function to request control while another person is screen-sharing.
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Word: Chat with Copilot about selected text
item.description:
Start a chat with Copilot while text in your document is selected, and Copilot's response will be scoped to what you have selected.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft 365 Copilot GCC general availability
item.description:
Bringing Microsoft 365 Copilot GCC, your AI assistant for work in the GCC environment. It combines the power of Large Language Models with your work content and context, to help you draft and rewrite, summarize and organize, catch up on what you missed, and get answers to questions via open prompts. Copilot generates answers using the rich, people-centric data and insights available in the Microsoft Graph. Microsoft 365 Copilot GCC is available in Teams (Chat and Channel) excluding Compose, Outlook (includes mobile), Word, PowerPoint, and Excel as well as other surfaces, including microsoft365.com.
More info: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/public-sector-blog/microsoft-copilot-for-microsoft-365-gcc-ga-update-empowering/ba-p/4222952
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - HR resignation date as a condition for risk level
item.description:
Admins can now select the HR resignation date as a condition to assign a minor, moderate, or elevated risk level. For example, an admin can configure the minor risk level to be assigned when an HR resignation date is sent via the HR connector. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management | Adaptive Protection - HR resignation date as a condition for risk level
item.description:
Admins can now select the HR resignation date as a condition to assign a minor, moderate, or elevated risk level. For example, an admin can configure the minor risk level to be assigned when an HR resignation date is sent via the HR connector. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2024
Preview date: November CY2023

item.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Editor simplification and introduction of light mode
item.description:
This change will simplify the Clipchamp editing experience and increase the space you have on the stage to make great videos. We're also introducing light mode as a new option for people to choose whether they view the Clipchamp editor in a Light or Dark scheme.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Tips pane entry point moving from Suite Header to Ribbon
item.description:
The Tips pane's entry point is moving from the Suite Header (found at the top of the window) to the Help tab of the Ribbon. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Describe it to design it within Teams Workflows
item.description:
Can't find a workflow template that matches what you need? You will now be able to describe in detail on how you want your automation to work and from that description generate a workflow to match your needs.
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Vote on and archive Questions in Teams Q&A
item.description:
Question voting allows instance participants to upvote the most important questions and sort by highest votes or recent activity. This gives moderators the ability to derive insights from the audience about what topics they care the most about and address them. Additionally, for questions that might be outdated or irrelevant, moderators can move them to a separate feed to ensure that presenters can focus on providing the most value to attendees.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Campaign Enhancements - Targeted campaigns and campaigns in the digest.
item.description:
Corporate communications and campaign managers will now have the capability to effectively promote their campaigns by sending notifications directly to users, ensuring they are promptly informed about new campaigns and can readily participate in them. Additionally, campaigns will be discoverable in the engage digest, enhancing visibility and engagement opportunities.
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Word: Get started on a draft immediately with example prompts
item.description:
On blank documents, Copilot in Word will provide one-click examples of prompts that quickly help you get going on your document.
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Syntex – simple document processing model
item.description:
A prebuilt model that uses OCR and AI to detect the primary language of the file, key-value pairs, tables, selection marks, and barcodes. As with other models, it can be configured to extract this information to specified library columns.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Whiteboard Copilot – First run experience
item.description:
