Copilot FRE will guide first-time users to discover and leverage the power of Whiteboard Copilot features. ​
GA date: April CY2024

item.title: Planner: Smart backgrounds for basic plans
item.description:
Get ready to customize your plans like never before! With smart backgrounds, you’ll be able to quickly spot the right plans. This feature was part of our legacy Planner experience, and we’re now enabling it for basic plans in the new Planner.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Retention Labels are available for Loop pages and components
item.description:
Organizations that rely on Microsoft's records management capabilities in Purview can now include Loop content in their workflows with Retention Labels on Loop pages and components. There's an in-app experience when a label is applied or a record is locked.
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Improved Report PDF Exports
item.description:
PDFs exported from Glint Reports are improved to be easily printable, searchable, and readable.
GA date: August CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Access to M365 header
item.description:
Solution displays M365 header in Viva Glint to improve discoverability of other M365 apps
GA date: August CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Copy list of attendees to clipboard
item.description:
Allow users to copy the list of attendees to clipboard from calendar event. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Schedule reports
item.description:
The feature enables users to schedule the export of reports on a recurring or on-demand basis. Additionally, users will be notified when the exported report or items are ready for use and download.
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

item.title: SharePoint: Pages - Updated Hero web part with new layout & styles
item.description:
The reimagined hero web part will feature a carousel layout and a selection of new styles, creating an eye-catching and engaging experience at the top of the page.
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: SharePoint: Syntex Optical Character Recognition (OCR) extends support for Microsoft Office files
item.description:
SharePoint OCR feature now extends support to Microsoft Office files. Previously, OCR was limited to PDFs and images but with this update, you can seamlessly extract and utilize text from any embedded images within any Microsoft Office files like Word, PowerPoint, and Excel.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Bidirectional support for Teams Live Interpretation
item.description:
With bidirectional support in Teams Live Interpretation, interpreters can now switch the direction they want to provide translation in between the two languages by clicking on the button of the language they want to interpret into at the bottom of the screen. The highlighted language button will be the language the interpreter is translating into and attendees hear from.
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Town halls in GCC-High (Premium)
item.description:
Set up and host large scale events across a GCC-High organization with the familiar Teams app you use for meetings using town hall. Town hall capabilities include a new meeting template, capacity for up to 20k attendees, green room, the ability to manage what attendees see, RTMP-in, live translated captions, and more.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Town halls now available in GCC-High
item.description:
Set up and host large scale events across a GCC-High organization with the familiar Teams app you use for webinars and meetings using town hall. Town hall capabilities include a new meeting template, capacity for up to 10k attendees, green room, the ability to manage what attendees see, RTMP-in, live translated captions, and more.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): BizChat - Copilot agents available in Business Chat web mode
item.description:
In Business Chat web mode, discover and use Copilot agents available for your organization. Agents are custom grounded chats that include specific knowledge sources from work and web.
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Contact deduplication on New Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the Web
item.description:
People are at the center of our lives, and we start every digital connection via contacts. Hence, a clean, up-to-date contact list is critical for better collaboration and productivity. We are happy to announce that cleaning up duplicate contacts just got a lot easier with the de-duplication feature on New Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the Web
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Whiteboard: Existing Azure Board Migration
item.description:
This feature will migrate boards that exist in your tenant's Azure storage to OneDrive for Business storage. More information will follow as we near release.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Visio: Containers in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
item.description:
Containers are a powerful tool for organizing and managing complex diagrams. Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to use containers in Visio for the web to create professional-looking diagrams that are easy to understand and navigate.

GA date: May CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Oversharing Pop-up enhancements on Outlook win32 desktop
item.description:
We are expanding the functionality of oversharing pop-ups (Show policy tip as a dialog) in outlook win32 to support additional scenarios powered with predicates such as Content is not labeled and Message/Attachment is not labeled, File extension is. It will also support a customizable oversharing dialog with the ability to configure custom title, body, business justifications, and dynamic variables/tokens for matched recipients, attachment names, and labels.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Detect workplace safety concerns in user-reported Teams messages
item.description:
Communication Compliance introduces the ability to identify and flag potential workplace safety concerns in user-reported Teams messages. Investigators now have an extra indication to decide what risk exists in user-reported messages and can configure an Inappropriate Content policy to proactively identify similar inappropriate content moving forward. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: November CY2024
Preview date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom background for Teams Rooms on Android
item.description:
IT admins can upload custom background images on the Teams admin center to reinforce their company brand on their Teams Rooms devices. The main room display, extended room display, and touch console can each have its own specific background image. PNG, JPG, and JPEG, formats are supported. This feature is only available with the Teams Rooms Pro license.
GA date: August CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Message/Attachment contains EXO predicates
item.description:
Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on DLP evaluation on specific email components like email body or attachments only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only.
GA date: August CY2024
Preview date: April CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Developers can use Kiota as an API plugin generation tool
item.description:
Developers using Teams Toolkit and Kiota can use them together as an API plugin generation tool. This unlocks new scenarios like searching our repository of public APIs, visually selecting the main integration endpoints and improving the maintainability of existing plugins by using a workspace file and allowing full regeneration of plugin files.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Co-organizer updates in Webinars
item.description:
Co-organizers can edit webinar details, publish the event, and cancel the event, similar to the organizer.

GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Message/Attachment contains EXO predicates
item.description:
Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on DLP evaluation on only specific email components like email body or attachments. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - New email scoring capabilities
item.description:
Insider risk management (IRM) email scoring logic is being updated. With current logic, a single email to multiple recipients is counted multiple times, creating noise by increasing the risk score. In the new logic, a single email to multiple recipients is counted once, and this new principle is applicable to the email containing multiple unallowed domains or priority content. Once this is rolled out, all the email insights in alerts will display the new count and score. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Outlook win32 DLP Policy tip & oversharing popup support for new DLP Predicates
item.description:
Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates support for DLP Policy tips and Oversharing popups for E5 users: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on client-side evaluation on specific email components (like email body or attachments) only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only and show DLP Policy tips and oversharing popups accordingly in Outlook win32.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Microsoft 365 Copilot usage report - Admins can view line of business agent usage
item.description:
Admins can view line of business Copilot agent usage in their tenant from the Microsoft 365 admin center.
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention-Improving DLP Policy tip text for matched recipients in Outlook win32
item.description:
We are updating the DLP Policy tip text in Outlook windows desktop client that appears when end users attempt to send a sensitive email to recipients who are not authorized by your organization's DLP policies. Users will soon receive a more gentle policy tip nudge to review recipients and content before sending email.
GA date: June CY2024
Preview date: April CY2024

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Microsoft 365 Copilot Usage report - Business Chat
item.description:
The Microsoft 365 Copilot usage report in the Microsoft 365 admin center will be updated to include usage of Microsoft 365 Copilot Business Chat (web) along with the existing usage data for Business Chat (work). It will also include enabled users and active users adoption information for new entry points Edge and Microsoft 365 App for Microsoft 365 Copilot.
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Default sensitivity labels and policies enhancements
item.description:
Eligible customers can activate default labels and policies for Microsoft Purview Information Protection that now extend to meetings.
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) trainable classifiers
item.description:
Leverage trainable classifiers from Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) to recognize various content types specific to your organization. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

GA date: October CY2024

item.title: SharePoint: Enhanced functionalities to manage SharePoint Embedded Containers through SharePoint Admin Center
item.description:
The new update empowers the SharePoint Embedded Administrators (SPE Admins) to manage their containers better through sorting and filtering capabilities as well as set sensitivity labels on containers. The SPE Admins now also have user role management capabilities to add, reassign, or remove users from various roles of a container.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Planner: Portfolio capabilities in Planner
item.description:
Structure plans into portfolios and get insights on top of your portfolios
GA date: November CY2024
Preview date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage content in Workplace Search
item.description:
As users search in office.com, sharepoint.com, bing at work they will find content from Viva Engage in the search results. We will first start with question posts and then roll out discussion posts from Engage.
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management | Adaptive Protection - Multi-policy selection
item.description:
Admins can now select multiple Insider Risk Management policies in the "Risk levels for Adaptive Protection" settings to assign risk levels in Adaptive Protection. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: September CY2024
Preview date: November CY2023

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - Enhancements to insider risk level settings
item.description:
This roadmap item was updated to 'launched' unintentionally. We apologize for the inconvenience. With this new feature, an admin can choose whether they want to expire the Adaptive Protection insider risk level. Today, this expiration happens automatically, but you can now choose to keep the Adaptive Protection insider risk level for a user, even if their alert is dismissed or case is closed. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2024
Preview date: May CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Sequence detections for obfuscation involving excluded events
item.description:
This change enhances sequence detection to improve its effectiveness in identifying users who are performing obfuscation activities that may result in a data security incident, such as file renaming, to evade detection. With this improvement, Insider Risk Management can detect sequences that may result in potential data security incidents, even if the obfuscation activities in those sequences involve excluded events, such as an excluded keyword. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: February CY2024
Preview date: September CY2023

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Extensibility - Automatic project scaffolding in Teams Toolkit for building Graph connectors
item.description:
Developers can now leverage an automatic project scaffolding for Graph connector applications within the Teams Toolkit, allowing for the generation of a full production-ready Graph connector application from just an API description file, significantly reducing setup time and complexity.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Developers can build custom engine agents with the Microsoft 365 Agents SDK
item.description:
Developers can use the Microsoft 365 Agents SDK to create custom engine agents. These agents, built on their own AI stack, can be deployed to various platforms, including Microsoft 365 Copilot, Microsoft Teams, and other non-Microsoft channels.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Quick rewrite, summarize, and to do actions with Copilot on OneNote canvas
item.description:
Use Copilot right in your workflow by invoking Copilot to generate a summary, a to-do list, or help you rewrite the content on the page or based on your selection.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Volume ratio control for language interpretation
item.description:
New user setting that enables meeting participants using language interpretation to control the volume ratio between the original meeting audio and the interpretation audio.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Notification in Activity feed and banner when intelligent meeting recap is ready
item.description:
Intelligent meeting recap users will receive a notification in Teams Activity feed and banner when intelligent meeting recap is ready. Clicking on the notification in Activity feed will take users right to the intelligent meeting recap experience, which will be visible to the right of the Activity feed. Users can configure their notification settings in Teams settings > Notifications and activity > Apps > Meeting Recap to control where the notification is surfaced (Activity and banner, Activity only, Off) as well as which meetings have notifications enabled (for only meetings with RSVP selection of “Follow,” or all other meetings, or both).
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Reset people suggestions in Outlook search for GCC, GCC High, and DoD
item.description:
This feature will allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through settings in the Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. When a reset is done, all versions of Outlook will reflect the change. This feature is already available in worldwide multitenant and will now be available for customers in GCC, GCC High, and DoD #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365: Updated settings for the Microsoft 365 app on Windows
item.description:
The Microsoft 365 app on Windows added settings to pin the app to the taskbar.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Drag emails into Calendar icon in the app bar to create an event
item.description:
Users can drag and drop emails into the Calendar icon on the left app bar of Outlook to create an event. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Admin units support for SharePoint Online
item.description:
Delegate management and remediation authority for different people in different regions or organization units with role-based access control (RBAC). For example, German investigators should be able to investigate alerts and audit events for only German users. This update extends support to SharePoint for Microsoft 365.
GA date: December CY2024
Preview date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft 365: Information Barriers (IB) upgrading from IB v1 to IB v2 with new capabilities
item.description:
Information Barriers (IB) V2 brings new capabilities including larger segment scale support, multi-segment support, and flexible people discoverability etc. Existing IB v1 tenants require an upgrade to IB v2 to take advantage of these new capabilities. This roadmap item is intended only for all IB v1 customers. All other customers will get IB v2 capabilities when they enable IB in their tenants. IB v2 upgrade will be opt-in.
GA date: March CY2026
Preview date: October CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Developers can use TypeSpec as an authoring experience
item.description:
Developers can use TypeSpec as an authoring experience for declarative agents and API plugins in Teams Toolkit.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Custom background on Teams panels
item.description:
Administrators can upload and set custom background images for Teams panels through the Teams admin center, enabling them to reflect their organization's branding. This feature will be available for Teams Rooms Pro and Teams Shared Devices licensed panels.
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Microsoft Copilot Dashboard Scope Filter enhancements
item.description:
Introducing exciting new features to help you better understand and improve adoption and impact of Copilot for Microsoft 365 through the Copilot Dashboard. Enhancements include supporting multi-select capabilities for Scope filters to facilitate group comparisons and the ability to upload HR organizational data for Scope filter updates.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Reference data from the Microsoft cloud when drafting with Copilot in Word
item.description:
Description & title updated to address a publishing issue, correct description as follows: Draft with Copilot will support attaching rich content from the Microsoft cloud--including emails and meetings--resulting in content that's more contextually relevant.
More info: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/blog/microsoft365copilotblog/what%E2%80%99s-new-in-microsoft-365-copilot-in-word-at-ignite-2024/4303448
GA date: January CY2024

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places
item.description:
Microsoft Places is an AI-powered workplace app for flexible work, empowering hybrid employees to foster in-office collaboration and leveraging insights into space optimization. Places intelligently allows you to coordinate your hybrid team to make the most of in-office days, modernize how employees make connections, and optimize space management with occupancy and utilization data.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Improved creation, editability, and saved views in review dashboards
item.description:
Users will save time in preparing for goal review processes with a simplified review dashboard creation and editing experience, and the ability to leverage saved views instead of starting from scratch. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap. We apologize for any inconvenience.
GA date: December CY2023

item.title: Microsoft 365: "Help me create" in Microsoft 365
item.description:
"Help me create" is a content create feature in Microsoft365.com that is powered by Copilot for Microsoft 365. Like Copilot, "Help me create" is built on Microsoft's comprehensive approach to security, compliance, and privacy.
GA date: February CY2024
Preview date: October CY2023

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Dashboard personalization on tablet in Viva Connections
item.description:
Customize your dashboard by adding, removing, or reordering the dashboard cards.
GA date: June CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals Enhanced Filters and Custom Views
item.description:
User can now filter OKRs in entity and explorer pages and save custom views to quickly access views that are most relevant.

GA date: December CY2023

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Math Progress
item.description:
Accelerate student math skills with Microsoft Teams: Math Progress.
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Managed booking with Copilot
item.description:
Building on booking suggestions, Copilot's managed booking feature rebooks room declines for single and recurring meetings, especially when room availability varies week to week. Additionally, Copilot will handle any changes, updates, and conflicts to guarantee a room for your meetings.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Space analytics
item.description:
Space analytics in Places provides dashboards for buildings, bookable rooms, and desk pools, providing a unified view of key metrics. Users can pick the space type of their interest and dive deeper to know more about its utilization.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Intelligent suggestions in calendar
item.description:
Intelligent suggestions will appear in the Places card in calendar and the Places people tab when users have actions to complete to organize their day. Users will be prompted to "quick book" rooms for in-person meetings and desks for in-office days. They will also see recommendations to update their work location to ‘Office’ when needed for in-person events.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Multi-Account Support for Add-Ins and Apps in new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
Currently, new Outlook for for Windows supports apps and add-ins for the user's primary account only. We will be enabling apps and add-ins to be supported across all of the accounts added to new Outlook, dynamically switching to the active identity. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: AI administrator role
item.description:
We are introducing a new admin role for AI and Microsoft Copilot administration. Admin users assigned with the AI Administrator role can efficiently manage Microsoft Copilot without the vast privileges of Global admin permissions.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Updates to mail sharing functionality with Cloud Policy Service when setting "Turn off sharing recommendation"
item.description:
Updates to the office Cloud Policy Service setting "Turn off sharing recommendation" will disable the ability for users to share folders with individual users. Currently, the policy blocked users' ability to update default and anonymous permission levels for shared folders. This functionality will remain and will not be changed. The current policy and how it works with calendar sharing will not be impacted by this change and will remain as implemented. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - Review set: Advanced filters
item.description:
Updates to eDiscovery (Premium) review filters experience that allow admins to construct compound nested filters with either “AND” or “OR” conditions, go back and forth (undo/redo) between different iterations of filters, manage saved filter queries without navigating to a different panel, and use “Is empty/Is not empty” condition for each filter.
GA date: December CY2024
Preview date: June CY2023

item.title: Windows 365: Concurrency assignment for Windows 365 Frontline in dedicated mode
item.description:
Concurrency assignment in Windows 365 Frontline in dedicated mode refers to the number of active Cloud PCs that can be used simultaneously within the total number of licensed Cloud PC usage for Frontline. This allocation ensures that resources are optimized based on the specific needs of the organization and its users.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: February CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: New Feature access management UI in Admin Center
item.description:
Through the new Feature Access management user interface, admins will be able to manage feature access settings directly in Microsoft 365 admin center. Feature access management allows admins to use access policies to manage which users can access specific features in Viva apps, so you can tailor your deployments to meet your local regulatory or business requirements. Previously, these policies could only be managed with Microsoft PowerShell cmdlets. After this rollout, admins can choose to use either Microsoft 365 admin center or PowerShell to manage feature access. Existing policies set for an organization will persist and can be managed in both places.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Participant roster grouping in Teams BYOD meeting rooms
item.description:
When participants join a Teams meeting with their laptop in bring your own device (BYOD) meeting rooms, they will appear in the ‘in-room’ participant section of the roster enabling individual identification and meeting intelligence capabilities.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Choose between Copilot Business Chat with web or work grounding
item.description:
In Outlook for iOS and Android, you will soon be able to choose whether Microsoft 365 Copilot Business Chat uses Microsoft 365 Graph (work) or Web grounding via a Work/Web toggle within the chat interface, just like you can at microsoft365.com/chat. Web grounding will be available for all commercial Microsoft 365 customers, while Graph grounding will require a Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Share to Teams will be added to the ribbon in the new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
Users will now be able to find a "Share to Teams" button in the ribbon whenever they select an email in the reading pane. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: July CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Purview support for Webinars
item.description:
IT admins can leverage Microsoft Purview for eDiscovery and legal hold needs to maintain compliance for webinars.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Event Chat for town halls (Premium)
item.description:
Previously in a town hall, only presenters and organizers could chat with each other. With this new update, attendees, presenters and organizers can now chat together during a town hall using the new Event Chat feature. Presenters and organizers can still chat privately during the town hall as well. A Teams Premium license is required for the organizer role to deploy this feature within town hall instances.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Copilot chat-assisted scheduling
item.description:
Copilot now helps you schedule simple meetings such as 1:1s and focus time. Just ask Copilot to find some time with someone in your org and it will find the optimal time. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights- Copilot for Sales Metrics & PBI Report
item.description:
Providing Copilot for Sales metrics for Viva Insights analysts in Advanced insights. Copilot for Sales adoption PBI report to provide a starter template to explore Copilot for Sales adoption across the organization.
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Purview support for town hall
item.description:
IT admins can leverage Microsoft Purview for eDiscovery and legal hold needs to maintain compliance for town halls.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Modifications in the Embedded container type creation cmdlets in PowerShell
item.description:
We’re introducing modifications in the container type creation cmdlets. The New-SPOContainerType cmdlet will only create a new container type. We are introducing the Add-SPOContainerTypeBilling cmdlet to add billing profile to the new container type.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: SharePoint: Additional support on SPAC to identify different types of Embedded containers and their principal owner
item.description:
The update enables SharePoint Embedded Administrators (SPE Admins) to identify the different kind of containers (user, tenant, and group) and the principal owner associated with the container.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: New usage reports for Microsoft Copilot with enterprise data protection
item.description:
The new report for Copilot (enterprise data protection) will include total active users, average daily active users, and active users of per app. The report will initially be limited to Copilot usage in the Microsoft 365 App and Microsoft Edge by users with a Microsoft 365 license. In the future, the report will include more apps. Admins can view usage insights as totals and can view trends for the last 7, 30, 90, or 180 days. The report will also show the last activity date per user, anonymized by default.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Unified Create button in Viva Engage
item.description:
This feature brings a new way for users to create posts, communities etc. through a centralized creation button in Viva Engage. Currently, Engage users need to go to different locations in the application for different creation types - a post, community, etc. Starting in October 2024, a Viva Engage user will be able to create the different types of content already enabled for them, using a centralized creation button. This new feature eases the process of creation and helps users quickly discover the various creation options they are licensed to use.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection for Word, Excel, and PowerPoint - Improved DLP policy tip reliability
item.description:
Word, Excel, and PowerPoint for Windows now consistently show the same policy tips that SharePoint Online and OneDrive for Business sites have determined should be shown on a file.
GA date: July CY2024
Preview date: June CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Notifications management for administrators to configure where Pulse notifications are delivered
item.description:
Pulse administrators can configure where Pulse notifications are delivered. This applies to Viva Pulse on the web and in the Viva app in Microsoft Teams.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Power Apps card for Viva Connections
item.description:
This card allows you to bring your Power Apps and Cards on the dashboard for quick access.
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Integration into Microsoft Copilot Dashboard from Viva Insights
item.description:
Initiate a Copilot impact survey that helps leaders and IT admins understand the return on investment of rolling out Copilot and AI tools across their organizations. Viva Pulse provides a way for organizations to capture sentiment data that maps to work patterns data from Viva Insights to measure AI adoption.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft 365: Updates to the Microsoft 365 app
item.description:
The Microsoft 365 app name, icon, and UI will evolve to support future AI-first experiences. Key UI changes include reducing the top header and consolidating app-level tools and settings into the App toolbar on the left.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Viva Pulse templates to measure Copilot readiness, adoption & impact as part of Microsoft 365 Copilot
item.description:
Viva Pulse authors can now use new templates specific to M365 Copilot Readiness, Adoption & Impact to measure employee sentiment around their organization's Copilot adoption. These templates will be available as part of your Microsoft365 Copilot subscription as well.
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Modernized user-defined permissions experience
item.description:
A modernized experience for selecting which users should have which permissions when a sensitivity label configured for user-defined permissions is applied to a file in M365 apps or when a user applies protection using standalone Information Rights Management.
GA date: September CY2024
Preview date: June CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Stream video recordings in the new Outlook for Windows and web
item.description:
We're introducing the ability to record and insert Stream video recordings in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon you will be able to record a video of yourself, your screen or both, directly from Outlook and insert the recording in your email.

GA date: October CY2024

item.title: OneDrive: Offline mode
item.description:
This feature will allow you to launch OneDrive in your browser and view, sort, rename, move, copy, and delete files even without internet access. Additionally, for locally stored OneDrive files (those that are marked as “always available offline”) you will be able to open and work on these in your browser even if you are offline. All of the changes you make offline will be automatically synced back when Internet connection is restored.

GA date: February CY2024
Preview date: November CY2023

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Download Transcription and View RTMP-In 708 Captions for Town hall and Webinar
item.description:
This feature allows event organizers to download transcripts for their town hall or webinar instances. It also adds support for displaying RTMP-In 708 captions in transcription.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Revamped Resources on mobile and tablet
item.description:
The Resources section on Viva Connections mobile and tablet will show content from the recently revamped Resources section on Viva Connections desktop.
GA date: August CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: New VDI solution for Teams
item.description:
New VDI solution for Teams is a redesigned version of the existing VDI solution, providing enhanced performance, reliability, and security. It offers additional features such as advanced meeting capabilities and a simpler app update experience for users. This Roadmap entry applies to Windows endpoints connecting to Azure Virtual Desktops, Windows 365 and Citrix VDI environments only.
GA date: June CY2024

item.title: Word: Draft on a selection and retain your existing formatting
item.description:
Draft on a selection and retain your existing formatting so that your content is seamless and fits with your document.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Refreshed view of all your teams and channels page
item.description:
A new ‘your teams and channels’ view provides you with a centralized hub where you can see all your teams and navigate to their channels from one page. This interface streamlines your workflows, enabling you to quickly access and manage your teams and channels.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Roster grouping for in-room participants through proximity join for Teams Rooms on Windows
item.description:
When joining a meeting in a Microsoft Teams Room on Windows with a companion device, in-room participants will be grouped under the room node. Participants must join through Proximity Join with Microsoft Teams Rooms.
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Detect Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions template
item.description:
Communication Compliance is introducing a new template dedicated to analyzing all Copilot for Microsoft 365 prompts and response to help ensure content prohibited by customers’ policies, such as harassing or threatening language, is not being used in Copilot for Microsoft 365 interfaces. This scales Communication Compliance’s reach, consistent with Microsoft 365’s expanding interfaces. In addition, administrators are also able to select Copilot chats as a checked location in the policy creation wizard for any new or existing policies. This empowers administrators to fine-tune their management strategy precisely to their organization’s needs, with a focus on user privacy protection. Whether it's setting specific conditions or deploying trainable classifiers, this feature provides flexibility and adaptability in compliance management, ensuring your organization's communications remain secure, compliant, and respectful of user privacy.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Integration of Glint and Pulse results into Copilot Dashboard
item.description:
Initiate a Copilot impact survey that helps leaders and IT admins understand the return on investment of rollout out Copilot and AI tools across their organizations. View results from responses to surveys initiated from Viva Glint or Viva Pulse directly in the Viva Insights Copilot Dashboard.
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Forms: Try the new streamlined and modernized experience in Forms to create your next form
item.description:
Enjoy a simpler, modernized interface on Forms. Toggle between upgraded templates as you create your form and then view insights and suggested actions when the responses come in.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Default sensitivity labels and policies enhancements
item.description:
Eligible customers can activate default labels and policies for Microsoft Purview Information Protection that now extend to meetings.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Cloud Policy service audit logs for policy changes
item.description:
Activities performed by administrators within the Cloud Policy service, like editing a policy configuration, will generate Audit logs stored in Purview Audit and will be accessible by Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users.
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Discover, acquire, and manage agents through in-app store in Word and PowerPoint
item.description:
With Copilot extensibility, users can discover, acquire, and manage agents through the unified store. We are excited to introduce the Microsoft 365 unified store to Office documents, enabling users to discover, acquire, and manage agents directly within the in-app store for Word and PowerPoint, with Excel support coming soon.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Microsoft Places - Individual desk booking
item.description:
With the addition of individual desk booking via Places Finder, employees can view individual desks, filter by sections, and book a specific desk.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Add attachments to forms
item.description:
Users will be able to add attachment fields to enhance their list forms. This feature allows users to upload files directly to the form, providing additional context or necessary documentation.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Schedule turning on and off responses to forms
item.description:
List form owners and collaborators can schedule specific dates and times to start and stop accepting responses. The form will be active during the designated period and will automatically stop accepting responses once the scheduled end time is reached.
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Lists - Be notified about new form responses on Lists
item.description:
Lists forms users can subscribe to be notified of new responses on their forms. By default, this would be toggled off, but a form collaborator can toggle on and receive an email notification for every new response on that form after.
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Town Halls
item.description:
This feature allows the organizers of town halls to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Webinars
item.description:
This feature allows the organizers of webinars to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Teams chat from email messages in the new Outlook for Windows
item.description:
This will allow users to start a Teams chat directly from an email message with the sender or all of the recipients in the email, the Teams chat opens in Outlook - so users can chat and continue their workflow in Outlook. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: March CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Reset People Suggestions in Search
item.description:
This feature will allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows settings. If a reset is done, all versions of Outlook will reflect the change. Note: The release month and status have been updated to show current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved People Search
item.description:
You can now search for content related to specific people. Start by typing the name of the relevant person in the search bar and select the filter to narrow down the search results and get relevant content suggestions.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Mute conversations
item.description:
Corporate communicators, network admins, and Engage admins can remove chosen conversation threads from the Engage Home Feed, storylines feed, and email digests. Conversations continue to show in community feeds, user profiles, and search. Muting a conversation does not affect notifications.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Enhancements to the DLP capabilities on macOS endpoints
item.description:
Mac DLP will have the following capabilities with these enhancements: Context Based Classification and Matched condition and short evidence for advanced classification.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Admin Units support for DLP alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender portal
item.description:
With this capability we are extending the Admin Units capability currently available in Microsoft Purview Information Protection and Data Loss Prevention (DLP) to DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal.

GA date: January CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: New expanded gallery view option for minimized meeting window
item.description:
When meeting window is minimized, participants can enlarge the small view of Teams meeting to a new bigger gallery view, making it easier to multitask on screen and stay aware of meeting events. Users can choose the size of the minimized gallery view window from the following options: one participant visible in the minimized window, 4 participants visible in the minimized window, fully minimized, or fully expanded.
GA date: August CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: See multiple participants and shared content preview in improved presenter window when screen sharing
item.description:
When sharing the screen or content, the presenter will now be able to better keep track of the participants' activity during a meeting. The Improved Presenter Window shows up to four meeting participants (both video and audio), who are active speakers and who raised hands, as well as a preview of the content being shared. Meeting notifications appear in the middle of the screen for better visibility. This gives presenters increased confidence and awareness of what is happening among participants during a meeting.
GA date: May CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updated welcome screen for the Microsoft 365 app on Windows
item.description:
The Microsoft 365 app welcome screen on Windows will be updated to display a welcome message and progress bar while the Microsoft 365 app loads.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - New Copilot with enterprise data protection prompt metric
item.description:
A new metric counting the prompts submitted through Business Chat (web) or Copilot with enterprise data protection metric will be added to Viva Insights advanced insights and Copilot dashboard.
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot inference and evaluation policy for Copilot in Teams meetings
item.description:
This policy enables IT admins to block Copilot responses that might infer emotions, make evaluations, discuss personal traits, and use context to deduce answers. When this setting is applied it restricts copilot’s ability to make inferences or evaluations about people or groups when prompted to do so by users. Users cannot disable this setting. The setting applies to Copilot in Teams meetings.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in policy match as evidence (customer managed storage)
item.description:
In the alerts triage and incident management experience, the admin can access a copy of the file that was restricted by DLP. The original file is uploaded to a customer managed storage (Azure blob). The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - New Copilot adoption metrics and completing total actions taken
item.description:
This adds seven new Copilot adoption metrics to the Copilot dashboard and Viva Insights Advanced insights. It also updates the "total actions taken" metric in the Copilot dashboard to include these new Copilot adoption metrics.
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: List-based Forms card for Viva Connections Dashboard
item.description:
This feature will allow operators to add a card for any form/survey created for data collection on the Viva Connections Dashboard for attention and quick action.
GA date: May CY2025

item.title: OneNote: OneNote Copilot on Mac
item.description:
OneNote Copilot on Mac is your intelligent assistant, transforming the way you interact with your notes. With simple natural language commands, Copilot helps you understand, summarize, and rewrite notes for enhanced clarity and purpose. It’s designed to work seamlessly on the Mac, offering a contextual chat experience that allows you to accomplish tasks faster than ever. Whether you’re preparing for a meeting or organizing your thoughts, OneNote Copilot on Mac is the perfect partner for boosting productivity and creativity on the go.
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: OneNote: Copilot Chat on OneNote for iPad
item.description:
OneNote Copilot on iPad is your intelligent assistant, transforming the way you interact with your notes. With simple natural language commands, Copilot helps you understand, summarize, and rewrite notes for enhanced clarity and purpose. It’s designed to work seamlessly on the iPad, offering a contextual chat experience that allows you to accomplish tasks faster than ever. Whether you’re preparing for a meeting or organizing your thoughts, OneNote Copilot on iPad is the perfect partner for boosting productivity and creativity on the go.
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Relevance recommendation for Message Center posts
item.description:
The new relevance recommendation in Message Center will help you determine how relevant a change is to your tenant. The recommendation (high, medium, or low) will be determined based on multiple factors, such as service usage and the type of change.
GA date: November CY2023

item.title: Outlook: Data Loss Prevention (DLP) Policy tips revamp for New Outlook
item.description:
Introducing new and improved DLP Policy tips in New Outlook for all E5 users. New DLP will support top DLP predicates and exceptions, all advanced classifiers, and override capabilities for E5 users. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Integration of Auto-Claim Policy for Licensing of Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp in your Tenant
item.description:
We're excited to announce an upcoming feature to enhance our Microsoft 365 offerings with a new, innovative auto-claim policy for Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp. These two applications can be configured as a policy, allowing users with active base offerings like Microsoft 365 E3/E5 Original SKUs to automatically claim a Microsoft 365 Extra Features E3/E5 license when needed. As they engage with Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp, a license from your tenant's pre-provisioned Microsoft 365 Extra Features E3/E5 SKU will be seamlessly assigned to them. This new feature is designed to simplify admin tasks and requirements.
GA date: April CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Write a prompt for selected portions of text in Word
item.description:
Writing a prompt to draft content based on your selection no longer expands your selection to the entire paragraph, table, or list. You can prompt based on a single sentence or item.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Write a prompt for selected portions of text in Word
item.description:
Writing a prompt to draft content based on your selection no longer expands your selection to the entire paragraph, table, or list. You can prompt based on a single sentence or item.
GA date: February CY2025

item.title: Outlook: Drag and drop to download attachments and emails for GCC
item.description:
Users can drag and drop attachments and emails from the new Outlook for Windows to their desktops or local folders to download them directly to that location. A feature that is already available in world-wide multitenant will now be available for customers in GCC. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Intune: MacOS user certs to be deployed in user keychain
item.description:
We are now announcing a significant enhancement in MacOS: the ability to store certificates in the user keychain. Previously, certificates were automatically stored in the device keychain, regardless of user or device type.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Intune: SCEP certificate delivery
item.description:
Intune solution for our customers as well as external partners to deliver SCEP certificates with the right security precautions to devices to mitigate the KDC issue.
GA date: October CY2024
Preview date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Policy Scoping changes in Data Loss Prevention for OneDrive
item.description:
Data Loss Prevention for OneDrive for Business will soon support user accounts and groups as part of the policy scoping location picker.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Checking feedback policy across all accounts
item.description:
Currently, when we determine whether a user is entitled to submit feedback, we only look at the feedback policy for their primary (global) account. Going forward, we are going to make the feedback policy check more restrictive which is more secure. We'll be looking at feedback policies for all users' accounts and basing their eligibility off the most restrictive policy value found. For example, if any of the users' accounts have Feedback disabled by a policy, we won't show the Feedback button in the Help tab of the ribbon for any of their accounts. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: AI Hub - UX enhancements
item.description:
The UX for Microsoft Purview AI Hub will have enhancements so that more recommendations can be displayed and triaged.
GA date: November CY2024
Preview date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection- User Message Recall in Outlook for encrypted messages
item.description:
Microsoft Purview Advanced Message Encryption will support Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature for encrypted messages in Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview AI Hub - Prompts and responses
item.description:
Within Microsoft Purview AI Hub, prompts and responses will appear for AI interaction events.
GA date: November CY2024
Preview date: August CY2024

item.title: SharePoint: New enhancements to Restricted access control using Microsoft 365 and Microsoft Entra security groups
item.description:
Restricted access control (RAC) is a premium security policy that lets admins restrict access to SharePoint and OneDrive resources to a specific set of users configured using Microsoft 365 or Entra Security groups. As part of this change, new capabilities will be added to review the impact of RAC application using insights reports and additional options to configure the policy will be made available. Also, policy enforcement visibility will be extended to Site owners via SharePoint sites.
GA date: August CY2024
Preview date: July CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Generate keyword query language from natural language prompt in eDiscovery with Copilot for Security
item.description:
Copilot for Security is embedded in eDiscovery to enable users to provide a search prompt in natural language and will translate into keyword query language to help expedite the start of an eDiscovery search.
GA date: December CY2024
Preview date: June CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Code Snippets in Viva Engage
item.description:
Users will be able to add code snippets to their posts, discussions, replies, questions, polls, and praises on Viva Engage. Additionally, if customers are licensed for Answers in Viva Engage, this feature will also be available when asking questions on Answers. To add code snippets, locate the new button on the publisher toolbar.
GA date: February CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage question post update
item.description:
Viva Engage is updating its questions to include two parts: a required field for the main question and an optional larger field for extra details.
GA date: March CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: AI hub in Microsoft Purview
item.description:
Update: Microsoft Purview AI Hub is released to general availability. Along with this release, the name has been rebranded to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI (DSPM for AI) and capabilities have been added that include supporting admin units, displaying AI policies that were created in Purview solutions, and supporting additional AI apps. A version of DSPM for AI is also available to additional licensing, specifically Microsoft 365 E3 and Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses. The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts - both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.
GA date: November CY2024
Preview date: May CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in policy match as evidence | customer managed storage
item.description:
In the alerts triage & incident management experience, the admin can access a copy of the file that was restricted by DLP. The original file is uploaded to a customer managed storage (Azure blob). The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity.

GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Offline app boot
item.description:
This introduces the ability to open or restart the new Outlook for Windows when not connected to the internet. Previously, you needed a connection to the internet to open or restart the new Outlook. Offline access is only supported when the app is already running and then goes offline. Opening and restarting the app while offline will be introduced with this rollout. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Publish analyst reports to Viva Insights App
item.description:
Viva Insights analysts will be able to publish reports they have created to specific recipients in the Viva Insights app.
GA date: November CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: File and conversation admin settings in Engage admin center
item.description:
Admins can now manage file and conversation-related settings from the Engage admin center without being routed to the legacy Yammer admin center.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview AI Hub - Updated permissions
item.description:
Microsoft Purview AI Hub supports updated permissions including the Microsoft Purview Compliance Administrator role group, Microsoft Purview Security Reader role group, and Microsoft Purview Content Viewer Content Explorer.
GA date: November CY2024
Preview date: August CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Add brand images in M365 Copilot from SharePoint organization asset libraries
item.description:
Copilot in PowerPoint and Word connects with your SharePoint organization asset library, making it easy to find and add images approved by your company to keep your presentation or document on brand.
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Mute user for network
item.description:
With this feature, Engage admins can remove specific users' posts from the Engage home feed, storylines feed, and all email digests. Selected users are not notified about this change. Engage admins may find this feature helps to moderate the visibility of content in the network. Mute user for network is part of a suite of moderation features in Engage, including view-only mode, close conversations, and more.
GA date: August CY2024

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Organizational messages
item.description:
Organizational messages allows enterprises to connect with their organization through customized messages, enabling them to engage directly within the Microsoft product experiences they use every day, like Windows Spotlight. Starting Spring 2024, Organizational messages will be found under the “Reports” section within the Microsoft 365 admin center and will include features for admins to centrally manage their tenant’s messages, create new messages, and review delivery reports.
GA date: November CY2024
Preview date: May CY2024

item.title: Visio: Mind maps in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
item.description:
Brainstorm and capture information in a structured format that makes it easy to understand and recall with new mind map shapes in Visio for the web.

GA date: May CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams menu bar icon with Presence on Mac
item.description:
Introduction of a Menu Bar icon with a flyout for common workflows that reduces clicks and simplifies checking for at-a-glance information like the presence status.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: OneDrive: Files On-Demand for Web
item.description:
The Files On-Demand options of “Always keep on this device” and “Free up space” will soon be made available on OneDrive for Web for your synced files. You will be able to select files and folders to be always available offline on your device directly from within the browser without having to navigate away to File Explore or Finder to perform this action. OneDrive will download these, and they'll take up space on your computer. You will also be able to “Free up space” by selecting a file or folder that you previously marked as "Always keep on this device", and they will no longer take up local storage space.
GA date: February CY2024
Preview date: November CY2023

item.title: OneDrive: Performance improvements
item.description:
This feature will provide faster page load times when using OneDrive for Web or when using the Files app in Teams irrespective of your network speed. You will see faster screen loading, sorting, filtering, file moving, and renaming. This increase in speed is made possible by storing file metadata in the local cache of your device as opposed to requesting it from the cloud service.
GA date: February CY2024
Preview date: November CY2023

item.title: Excel: Post-migration Excel remediation
item.description:
Enable the remediation of incompatible formulas and file links in formulas in Excel files after migration from other cloud platforms to Microsoft 365.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference data from the Microsoft cloud when drafting with Copilot in Word
item.description:
Draft with Copilot will support attaching rich content from the Microsoft cloud--including emails and meetings--resulting in content that's more contextually relevant.
More info: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/blog/microsoft365copilotblog/what%E2%80%99s-new-in-microsoft-365-copilot-in-word-at-ignite-2024/4303448
GA date: June CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Voice and face data export controls
item.description:
This new feature provides controls for voice and face profile data export for users. To ensure security and protection of user privacy, individuals can export their own profile data limiting risk of download or sharing by tenant administrators.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint and Viva Insights Integration for Sentiment and Collaboration Data
item.description:
This integration will allow HR users and analysts combine sentiment and collaboration data together into the rhythm of their business to better understand their people’s full work experience. Integrating Viva Glint employee survey scores with Viva Insights data helps identify opportunities and strengths to meet organizational goals.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Apply coaching suggestions for Coaching by Copilot
item.description:
Apply coaching suggestions will allow users to request a complete rewrite of their email based on feedback from Coaching by Copilot and in one click, accept and rewrite their email with those suggestions.
GA date: September CY2024
Preview date: August CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview | Communication Compliance: Integration with Power Automate (GCC-High and DoD)
item.description:
Communication Compliance integration with Power Automate allows organizations to configure Power Automate flows to automate tasks for Communication Compliance cases and users. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: April CY2025
Preview date: February CY2022

item.title: Microsoft Purview | Communication Compliance: Integration with Power Automate
item.description:
Currently in public preview, Communication Compliance integration with Power Automate allows organizations to configure Power Automate flows to automate tasks for Communication Compliance cases and users. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap. We apologize for any inconvenience.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: April CY2025

item.title: Microsoft Teams: External presenters can join on mobile
item.description:
This update allows presenters who were invited using the external presenter feature to join via their Android and iOS Teams client.
GA date: September CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Bulk export of learner completion records
item.description:
Learner Completion Record bulk export is an extension of an existing feature to download Learner record by username. Bulk export empowers enterprises to download learner records of multiple users in one go using the M365 groups.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross-platform meetings via SIP join for Teams Rooms
item.description:
Joining SIP-based conferencing services like Google Meet, Zoom, Cisco Webex, and others via Teams Rooms offers a seamless collaboration experience, mirroring the native Teams interface. This integration supports features such as 1080p video, dual screen, various layout options, HDMI input, and others contingent on the third-party platform's in-meeting controls. A SIP calling plan from a CVI partner, currently Pexip, is necessary. This is available for Teams Rooms customers with a Pro license.
GA date: October CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Page header enhancements
item.description:
We’ve made enhancements to the Viva Engage page header for a more streamlined experience. The header now pulls in more relevant content and emphasizes key actions like "Join." Additionally, we’ve reduced the icon size slightly to prevent overlap with background images, ensuring improved visibility and interaction.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Places - Auto update location with Workplace Presence
item.description:
With Workplace Presence, you can discover coworkers who are in office nearby. Location will be automatically updated to “office” when we detect that an employee is on site, signaled by the connection of their laptop to a known peripheral, e.g. a known or company-managed monitor in a corporate office, or on a bookable desk. Users can enable/disable “Auto-update my location when detected in the office” via the Places settings menu in Teams.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: SharePoint: eSignature integration with Adobe and Docusign rolling out globally
item.description:
Previously, the use third-party providers as part of SharePoint eSignature platform were limited to regions supported by Microsoft's native SharePoint eSignature. With this release, customers can now enjoy the flexibility of using these third-party providers globally, wherever they are supported.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft 365: Cloud Update logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
item.description:
Activities performed by administrators within the Cloud Update service, like enabling Cloud Update or changing a Cloud Update configuration setting, will generate Audit logs stored in Purview Audit and will be accessible by Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Auto-reading emails with Narrator
item.description:
This feature will allow users utilizing the Windows Narrator screen reader tool to have messages read aloud automatically after opening the email. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Recap for GCC High environment
item.description:
Intelligent meeting recap uses AI to provide a quick summary of your meeting, highlighting key discussion points, identifying follow-up actions, and offering quick access to significant points such as name mentions, when a screen was shared, individualized speaker markers, topics, and chapters.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Global exclusions
item.description:
With this update, all exclusion features currently found under intelligent detections will be relocated to a new tab labeled "Global exclusions" within the insider risk settings. All previously added exclusions in intelligent detections will be migrated to this new tab. The functionality of exclusions remains unchanged. Moreover, admins with appropriate permissions can now add exclusion via defined detection groups, which contain similar entities like domains or file types. This new tab is designed to enhance usability and offers a convenient way to access and manage exclusions. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: October CY2024
Preview date: April CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - Audit Search Graph API
item.description:
Microsoft Graph offers a unified API endpoint for accessing data from multiple Microsoft cloud services in a single response. This feature allows our customers to programmatically access the new async Audit Search experience, which also provides improved reliability and search completeness, through Microsoft Graph API.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot in Viva Glint
item.description:
Highlight top issues and potential solutions hidden throughout employee suggestions from survey results; plus, help leaders explore comments using natural-language questions.
GA date: November CY2024
Preview date: June CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Cloud IntelliFrame video feed support extended to Teams Rooms on Android and Teams mobile devices
item.description:
Cloud IntelliFrame, the video framing feature that enhances the visibility of people in the room for online meeting attendees, is now available for Teams Rooms on Android and Teams Mobile users when they join a meeting that has participants in a Teams Rooms on Windows.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Microsoft 365 Copilot suggested users license assignment flow
item.description:
Microsoft 365 Copilot suggested user license assignment flow is a new feature in the Microsoft 365 admin center designed to help organizations streamline Microsoft 365 Copilot license assignment and optimize utilization. This feature uses a data-driven approach to suggest users who are in the best position to gain the most value from Microsoft 365 Copilot and efficiently assign licenses to these users.
GA date: January CY2025

item.title: Visio: Edit legacy .vsd files in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
item.description:
Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to edit legacy .vsd files in Visio for the web by creating an exact copy (except macros) and saving it in the latest .vsdx format.
GA date: March CY2024

item.title: Visio: Infinite Canvas in Visio for the web
item.description:
Infinite canvas in Visio for the web is an expansive digital canvas designed to remove spatial limitations. It will allow users to stretch their creative boundaries by providing the room they need to capture, organize, and visualize ideas without constraints.
GA date: March CY2024

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Unified Google Workspace Migration
item.description:
Offer Microsoft 365 customers a seamless experience for migrating Google Workspace workloads to M365. Through a unified portal page, you can initiate and monitor migration tasks for both Gmail and Google Drive. Additionally, if your Google Workspace tenant has fewer than 1,000 users, you'll benefit from the newly revamped Gmail migration flow, which simplifies the process and guides you through each step.
GA date: March CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Google Groups to M365 Modern Groups Migration Service
item.description:
Google Groups to M365 Modern Groups Migration Service is a 1st party service for migrating Google groups with the M365 Admin center as a new feature, so that Google compete customers moving to M365 would have the ability to automatically create the groups, its members, member conversations and all permissions to M365 Groups without the need to recreate the groups which is the only solution for customers moving from Google.
GA date: February CY2025
Preview date: January CY2025

item.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Google to Entra Identity Sync service
item.description:
Google to Entra Identity Sync service is a cloud-2-cloud user Identity onboarding and one way synchronization tool from Google workspace to Entra ID. This will be available as part of the M365 Admin center for Google compete customers moving into M365 to create the identities in M365 farm and move Drive and Mail content into Onedrive and Exchange online
GA date: January CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024

item.title: Outlook: Junk/Phishing reporting actions integrated with Microsoft Defender in classic Outlook for Windows
item.description:
The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in classic Outlook for Windows can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.
GA date: August CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in town hall
item.description:
Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Mesh app on Meta Quest headsets supports hand interactions
item.description:
Microsoft Mesh app users on Meta Quest 2, 3, and Pro headsets can now use their hands to use the app, move around in event environments, and interact with objects. Motion controllers continue to be supported, and users can switch between using controllers or their hands while using the app.
GA date: November CY2024

item.title: Microsoft Teams: New collaborative Project Studio environment in Microsoft Mesh
item.description:
